Real manliness is nurtured in kindness and gentleness, which I associate with intelligence, comprehension, tolerance, justice, education, and high morality. If only men realized how easy it is to open a woman's heart with kindness, and how many women close their hearts to the assaults of the Don Juans.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: Many times people take my kindness for stupidity, including "christians" will try to take advantage of your kindness if you allow them, but if I feel helping them I'll tolerate bit of my kindest, not because i'm stupid but because I have a gentle heart
author: Zybejta Beta Metani'Marashi

quote: The right way to start your day...Guard well within yourself with benevolence, Hateful people will always try to provoke you.
author: Napz Cherub Pellazo
category: benevolence, guard-well, inspirational, kindness, right-path, start-day

quote: What weighs us down is not gravity! A little force of kindness can decelerate depravity.
author: Igbinovia Ixrael Lee
category: charity, depravity, force, giving, good, help, kindness, life, love, piety, sobriety

quote: Allow your daily small acts of kindness to degenerate into a lifetime of human excellence.
author: Sravani Saha Nakhro

quote: I don’t believe in a god, not in the traditional sense anyway. I guess that’s what being raised Catholic has done to me. But I do believe in energy. I do believe in right and wrong. I do believe in kindness and truth.
author: R.B. O'Brien

quote: Live in a dignified way with nobility, pride, strength, and kindness.
author: Seiji Fuji, Theoretical Modern History
category: dignity, inspirational, kindness, life, nobility, philosophy, virtue, virtues

quote: Often the best gifts we can give each other cost nothing.
author: Russ Ramsey, Struck: One Christian's Reflections on Encountering Death

quote: As a child, I once suffered a bad fall that resulted in scratched palms and scraped knees. I remember how badly it stung, the cold air hitting my bleeding wounds; I felt that I couldn’t stand up for the pain. Through a veil of tears, I recall a kind hand reaching for me and helping me to my feet. My knees and palms were washed clean, and I remember thinking that for the rest of my life, I wanted to help people stand back up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: be-kind, charity, good-samaritan, helping, helping-others, kindness, love, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: But remember that good intentions pave many roads. Not all of them lead to hell.
author: Neal Shusterman, Scythe
category: death, good-intentions, hell, kindness, neal-shusterman, scythe, young-adult

quote: Selfishness is easy to find. Selflessness is a much rarer beast.
author: Stewart Stafford

quote: Think before you click. If people do not know you personally and if they cannot see you as you type, what you post online can be taken out of context if you are not careful in the way your message is delivered.
author: Germany Kent
category: awareness, awareness-and-attitude, awareness-quotes, best-practices, blogging, blogging-etiquette, blogging-quote, bullying, bullying-quotes, communication-tips, cyberbullying, cybersense, cyberspace, digital, digital-age, digital-citizens, digital-citizenship, digital-culture, digital-etiquette, digital-footprints, digital-life, digital-lit, digital-marketing, digital-media, digital-mind, digital-skills, digital-thinking, digitale, ed-tech, end-bullying, ethics, ethics-matter, etiquette-tips, germany-kent, germany-kent-quote, germany-kent-quotes, good-manners, hate-speech, higher-education, hope-guru, internet-education, internet-tips, issues, kindness, manners, marketers, media-literacy, motivational-speaker, motivational-speakers, netiquette, no-to-bullying, online, online-bullying, online-communication, online-discussion, online-ethics, online-etiquette, personal-branding, professional, protocol, responsibility, responsible-posting, self-help-authors, smart-tech, social-education, social-media, social-media-advice, social-media-audiences, social-media-authors, social-media-behavior, social-media-mind, students, table-talk, the-hope-guru, think-before-you-click, think-before-you-post, think-twice, tips, web-marketing, you-are-what-you-tweet, youth

quote: This woman did not know me, but she knew this stretch of trail. She didn't know if I was kind or mean, gentle or abrasive, honest or a liar. She didn't need to know what I had accomplished in life or what I had wasted. She just knew that if I was there in her hospital on my birthday, I was probably feeling a little lost. On that basis alone, i mattered to her.
author: Russ Ramsey, Struck: One Christian's Reflections on Encountering Death

quote: The very next day after Miss West and I’d talked about her son and missions, she was the same as she’d always been: volatile and unhappy with a hatred that spewed out of her like missiles. I thought I understood why. She must have hated us for being alive when her son was dead.Lately the class has been turning against her. They’re openly hostile, and they whisper plots for revenge. It seems unfair, the way unhappiness flows out of a person, just to ricochet.  “Adam…do you think we have a missions?” He looks at me with a confused expression. “What kind of missions?” “I don’t know. Do you think you have a mission?” I shrug, disappointed. If Adam doesn’t know, then I guess no one does.  A girl turns onto our hall, eyes red and sad, and she passes, Adam sends her a smile. Her whole face brightens and she sends him a smile back.  Hate ricochets, but kindness does too. Page 178.
author: Robin Roe

quote: I find it a challenge to respect capable people who care only for their own interests.
author: Brandon Mull, Dragonwatch

quote: Do not wait until Christmas to spread a little cheer,people appreciate kindness, all through of the year.
author: Charmaine J. Forde
category: appreciate, cheer, christmas, kindness, spread, year

quote: For all those people, who took advantage of my kindness. Thank you. I won't drop to your level. I'll simply smile and move on.
author: Saif Ullah

quote: They celebrated the sins, while the kindness continued to weep in the corner. The swords of the demons shined brighter, while the wings of the angels were crumpled and bled.
author: Akshay Vasu
category: angels, bled, bright, celebrate, crumple, demons, kindness, shine, sins, swords, weep, wings

quote: There are those who are awkward in the face of sorrow, fearing to say the wrong thing; to them, I say, there is no wrong in comfort, ever. A kind word, a consoling arm ... these things are ever welcome.
author: Jacqueline Carey, Kushiel's Dart

quote: I could doubt the value of my books as much as many do, except that, as a researcher and very curious person, I do read a lot too, and can clearly see the difference in value between what I do and what others do. I have no doubt that my books have much more value than nearly all others out there, and it wouldn't make sense for me to be an author if I couldn't see that, or if I saw the opposite, as I believe that, if we're not upgrading mankind, we're just making it lost and vulnerable to the claws of ignorance.
author: Robin Sacredfire
category: altruism, author, authors, authorship, daniel-marques, freemasonry, illuminati, kindness, positivism, research, rosicrucianism, secret-societies, warm-hearted, writer, writers, writing

quote: You were kind.”Cazaril shrugged. “Why not? What could it cost me, after all?”Bergon shook his head. “Any man can be kind when he is comfortable. I’d always thought kindness a trivial virtue, therefore. But when we were hungry, thirsty, sick, frightened, with our deaths shouting at us, in the heart of horror, you were still as unfailingly courteous as a gentleman at his ease before his own hear
author: Lois McMaster Bujold, The Curse of Chalion

quote: The century of Einstein and Planck was also the century of Hitler. The Gestapo and the scientific renaissance were children of the same age. How humane the nineteenth century seemed, that century of naive physics, when compared with the twentieth century, the century that had killed his [Viktor's] mother. There is a terrible similarity between the principles of Fascism and those of contemporary physics.Fascism has rejected the concept of a separate individuality, the concept of "a man," and operates only with vast aggregates. Contemporary physics speaks of the greater or lesser probability of occurrences within this or that aggregate of individual particles. And are not the terrible mechanics of Fascism founded on the principle of quantum politics, of political probability?Fascism arrived at the idea of the liquidation of entire strata of the population, of entire nations and races, on the grounds that there was a greater probability of overt or covert opposition among these groupings than among others: the mechanics of probabilities and of human aggregates.But no! No! And again no! Fascism will perish for the very reason that it has applied to man the laws applicable to atoms and cobblestones!Man and Fascism cannot co-exist. If Fascism conquers, man will cease to exist and there will remain only man-like creatures that have undergone an internal transformation. But if man, man who is endowed with reason and kindness, should conquer, then Fascism must perish, and those who have submitted to it will once again become people.
author: Vasily Grossman, Life and Fate

quote: Stop looking for flaws, and kindness come much more easily.
author: Deepak Chopra, Fire in the Heart: A Spiritual Guide for Teens

quote: I sometimes get the feeling that he was less pleased by kindness itself than by the elegance of the gesture.
author: Donna Tartt, The Secret History

quote: Faced with delicate issue, consider kindness and deference. It's neither familiarity, indifference nor ire, but a perceived warmth to another soul
author: Val Uchendu
category: anger-quotes, delicate, familiarity, feelings-quotes, indifference, issues, kindness, kindness-quotes, soul-quotes

quote: No act of kindness deserves a debt in return.
author: Erin Forbes, Fire & Ice: The Elementals

quote: She had needed kindness before, and had received none. Now it was too late, and she did not know what to do with it.
author: Frances Hardinge, The Lie Tree

quote: Why should our nastiness be the baggage of an apish past and our kindness uniquely human? Why should we not seek continuity with other animals for our 'noble' traits as well?
author: Stephen Jay Gould
category: animal, cognitive-evolution, kindness, nastiness, noble, traits

quote: If everything I possessed, vanished, suddenly,I'd be sorry.But I value things unpossessed.The wind, and trees, and sky and kind thoughts, much more.
author: Dorothy Hartley
category: kindness, possessions, sky, tree, value, wind

quote: When you have a good heart, kindness becomes a responsibility you take up.
author: Ufuoma Apoki, The Return of Lucas

quote: Life is too short, so don't let no one to ruin your day, the best way to avoid them is to kill them with kindest
author: "Beta" Metani' Marashi

quote: He trusted that I would have a very pleasant stay: it was so peaceful, and the meals were delicious. As he said it, I realized that he was expressing not just a belief, but a hope, because he was one of those people, and you don't see them every day, who take an instinctive pleasure in the happiness of their fellow men – that he was, in other words, a nice guy.
author: Michel Houellebecq, Soumission

quote: But above all, above respect and esteem, there was a motive within her of good will which could not be overlooked. It was gratitude. -- Gratitude, not merely for having once loved her, but for loving her still well enough, to forgive all the petulance and acrimony of her manner in rejecting him, and all the unjust accusations accompanying her rejection. He who, she had been persuaded, would avoid her as his greatest enemy, seemed, on this accidental meeting, most eager to preserve the acquaintance, and without any indelicate display of regard, or any peculiarity of manner, where their two selves only were concerned, was soliciting the good opinion of her friends, and bent on making her known to his sister.
author: Jane Austen, Pride and Prejudice
category: elizabeth-bennet, kindness, love, mr-darcy, pride, pride-prejudice, regency, romance

quote: For the kindest of them was as far out of touch, as unreachable, as the crudest.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin, The Word for World is Forest

quote: The air was filled with phantoms... and... the misery with them all was, clearly, that they sought to interfere, for good, in human matters, and had lost the power forever.
author: Charles Dickens, A Christmas Carol and Other Christmas Writings

quote: Words like “patience”, and “kindness”, and “goodness”. They are the words of a hero.
author: Mark Andrew Poe, Ending Easter
category: goodness, harry-moon, hero, kindness, patience, values

quote: You can get anything you want if you're nice to people. People like to do things for people, it's so easy to be kind.
author: Kate Moretti, The Vanishing Year

quote: Zoe leaned closer to Ruth, nearly nose to nose. “If they were made from better stuff, they would have pretended the fault was theirs. They would have made a moment of it--a pretty moment.
author: Michael Benzehabe
category: benzehabe, consideration, good-manners, immigrant, immigration, kindness, social-graces, unassimilated

quote: Plucking a flower and giving it to someone is not an act of kindness
author: it is a behaviour of killing a defenceless fragile beauty for the sake of our own interest!

quote: Diplomacy is so weak and prosaic. Diplomacy must never become an end, itself. Facts are so much more important in science. Yet, I'm beginning to appreciate the value of a soft word and a smile. --Unassimilated pg 294
author: Michael Benzehabe
category: diplomacy, immigration, iran, kindness, michael-benzehabe, unassimilated

quote: Even the most kindest person in the world, can be the most cruelest person.
author: PureDragonWolf

quote: You can't worry about the rest of the world, never mind the rest of the universe. All you can do is look to your left and your right and try to be kind to whoever is there.
author: Rowan Coleman, We Are All Made of Stars

quote: Are you a Buddhist?""No, I'm an asshole. But I keep trying.
author: Scott Hawkins, The Library at Mount Char

quote: She may not be the prettiest, or the smartest, or the wealthiest at the Academy, but she could be kind. Anyone could be kind.
author: Alleece Balts, The Crowd
category: boarding-school, bullying, bullying-isn-t-right, kind, kind-quotes, kindness, pretty, smart, truth, wealth

quote: If you appreciate, you will appreciate.
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: Be a goal-setter, a go-getter, all the while, moving, in humility and kindness.
author: Kamini Arichandran

quote: Though Julian could be marvelously kind in difficult circumstances of all sorts, I sometimes got the feeling that he was less pleased by kindness itself than by the elegance of the gesture.
author: Donna Tartt, The Secret History
category: donna-tartt, elegance, fake, julian-morrow, kindness, the-secret-history

quote: Answer suffering with kindness.
author: Claudia Gray, Star Wars - Bloodline

quote: And just as there is random horror-murder,suicide,child abuse,car accidents.......there is also indiscriminate kindness.Not merely miracles,though I have experienced them.But simple human connection,either brokered by an angel or sourced by one.That is why I try to encourage people to be receptive to that new person who seems to have appeared in their life out of nowhere.
author: Chris Bohjalian, Secrets of Eden

quote: Verily the kindness that gazes upon itself in a mirror turns to stone,And a good deed that calls itself by tender names becomes the parent to a curse
author: Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

quote: What I want is so simple I almost can’t say it: elementary kindness.
author: Barbara Kingsolver, Animal Dreams

quote: I have found that it is the small everyday deed of ordinary folks that keep the darkness at bay. Small acts of kindness and love." ~ Gandalf (J. R. R. Tolkein ~ The Hobbit)
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: The biggest sin in Satanism is not murder, nor is it kindness. It is stupidity.
author: Marilyn Manson, The Long Hard Road Out of Hell
category: antireligion, kindness, murder, satanism-religion, sin, stupidity

quote: The world is a chaotic place find a love that doesn't allow a home to have the same feeling.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: happiness, inner-being, kindness, kindred-spirits, love, relationships, true-love, unconditional-love

quote: t wait until you become rich to help somebody, kindness doesn't always require money
author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: Don't wait until you become rich to help somebody, kindness doesn't always require money
author: Charmaine J. Forde

quote: Plant seeds of kindness and watch your blessings flow abundantly
author: Charmaine J. Forde
category: abundantly-flow, blessings, kindness, plant, seeds, watch

quote: Be kind to UNKIND people.They need it the most.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: As much as we seek approval, we dread condemnation
author: Dale Carnegie, How to Win Friends and Influence People

quote: Your words to yourself and to others should uplift, never tear down.
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: Cracks in our souls help us bear the overwhelming imperfections of the world. They're not our flaws. Kindness knows this.
author: Aditya Bhaskara

quote: So much drama off and online...Be kind and respect others.Follow the golden rule. Always.Don't step on others.Chase your dreams the right way.Keep your head up. Then, everything else will take care of itself.
author: K.J. Kilton
category: be-kind, care, drama, golden-rule, kindness, respecting-others

quote: Only kindness is spreadable
author: because that is how we live

quote: Unexpected and pleasant surprises occur every day...random kindnesses from a stranger
author: would-be tragic accidents narrowly avoided
category: sicknesses healed.... We will notice if we look. We will see good sprinkled liberally over every day if we are open.

quote: We cannot know. But sometimes there is kindness, and sometimes there is love.
author: Guy Gavriel Kay, Children of Earth and Sky

quote: There was a little girlWho had a little curlRight in the middle of her forehead.When she was good, she was very, very good.And when she was “bad”,Her Papa loved her anyway.
author: Kristen McKee, Nursery Rhymes for the Unconditional and Unschooled
category: kindness, partnership, rewriting-history, unconditional, unconditional-love, unschooling

quote: Since you cannot always carry and display your diploma. Kindly act like you have one. Professionalism. Include that to your dictionary.
author: Joshua De Vera Bautista

quote: I hate in-the-end kindnesses: they're about as nourishing as the third day of cold mutton.
author: Edith Wharton, Old New York: Four Novellas

quote: I know the scent of betrayal. I may be kind to you, but don't mistake my kindness for weakness. After all, the Angels have a sharp sword too
author: Joshua De Vera Bautista

quote: Rock-a-bye Baby In the tree topWhen the wind blows The cradle will rock.When the bough breaksThe cradle will fallAnd Mama will catch you Cradle and all!
author: Kristen McKee, Nursery Rhymes for the Unconditional and Unschooled
category: baby-shower, kindness, nursery-rhymes, parenting, partnership, unconditional-love, unschooling

quote: Even the kindest saint does have their own adversary
author: Joshua De Vera Bautista

quote: When you stop living for luxuries you understand the real meaning of life.
author: Edhi Sahab, 1928-2016
category: generosity, helping-others, kindness, life, luxury, meaning-of-life

quote: If 10 percent of the population were to take a consciously ethical outlook on life and act accordingly, the resulting change would be more significant than any change of government,
author: Peter Singer, Writings on an Ethical Life

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible. And be kinder than is necessary.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: It's not a big thing, but I guess it's true- big things are often just small things that are noticed.
author: Ned Vizzini, It's Kind of a Funny Story

quote: There is no inner peace found in taking care of me and mine. It is present in attending to the needs of we and ours.
author: John Bruna

quote: In a world full of sadness and travail, kindness is not to be underestimated. You have the change to do a great deal of good, my dear, just by showing kindness to those the trail brings your way. Whatever you do, do your work heartily, not as unto men, but as unto God. He will take notice and He will be pleased.
author: Stephanie Grace Whitson, Messenger By Moonlight

quote: Kindness and love, love and kindness.. You can't have one without the other.. Kindness and love go hand-in-hand.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk Has a Birthday
category: a-snowy-day, heather-wolf, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-s-joke-book-for-kiddies, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, love, love-and-kindness, love-quotes, the-long-spring

quote: My reason to live is to love, my reason to get is to give. - The Lord is my witness.
author: Nurudeen Ushawu
category: ethics, generosity, inspirational, kindness, life, wisdom

quote: Don't consider my kindness as my weakness, the beast in me is sleeping not dead.
author: Moosa Rahat
category: beast, consider, dead, kindness, sleeping, weakness

quote: For though men be ignorant, yet they are men
author: Baruch Spinoza, Ethics
category: courtesy, ethics, ignorance, kindness, moral-philosophy, philosophy, spinoza, tolerance

quote: Do what you can to avoid or neutralize conversations which put people down. Think with your heart.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Being extra nice to someone can be a form of manipulation--kindness is an exercise of power in its own right.
author: Wang Anyi, The Song of Everlasting Sorrow: A Novel of Shanghai

quote: When I realize I made someone's day, it makes my day.
author: Genesis Quihuis

quote: You don't need your eyes to love, Right?
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: You might pass by those who're stuck in the bottle neck while you are swimming in your whiskey, be kind !
author: Farid F. Ibrahim

quote: Before you go to bed think about what you left behind in the wake of the day…
author: Nanette L. Avery

quote: …there was no more that I could do to make myself look better in that moment than smile and be kind…
author: Andie Mitchell, It Was Me All Along

quote: The surest cure for selfishness is to continually practice random acts of kindness.
author: R.A.Delmonico

quote: It was a good thing to be an African. There were terrible things that happened in Africa, things that brought shame and despair when one thought about them, but that was not all there was in Africa. However great the suffering of the people of Africa, however harrowing the cruelty and chaos brought about by soldiers—small boys with guns, really—there was still so much in Africa from which one could take real pride. There was the kindness, for example, and the ability to smile, and the art and the music.
author: Alexander McCall Smith, Morality for Beautiful Girls

quote: We should be carefulOf each other, we should be kindWhile there is still time
author: Philip Larkin, Collected Poems

quote: The mower stalled, twice; kneeling, I foundA hedgehog jammed up against the blades,Killed. It had been in the long grass.I had seen it before, and even fed it, once.Now I had mauled its unobtrusive worldUnmendably. Burial was no help:Next morning I got up and it did not.The first day after a death, the new absenceIs always the same; we should be carefulOf each other, we should be kindWhile there is still time.
author: Philip Larkin, Collected Poems

quote: For he did not seem to know any way to do a person a kindness but by killing him.
author: Mark Twain, The Mysterious Stranger

quote: Kindness in looks and words and ways is true politeness, and any one can have it if they only try to treat other people as they like to be treated themselves.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: No one is on this world today to be a pessimist. They may be one for a while, but they will always turn optimistic with the help of many people. Kindness, makes everyone feel better.It's like involuntary muscles. Your involuntary muscles didn't volunteer to do this for you, for your body functions. They just do it to keep you going.Kindness isn't given simply because they chose to. It is a natural act that everyone has, even if it isn't shown all the time. It is used to save people, to let them feel loved and important. Kindness can carry people a mile.
author: Hina Yu

quote: Everything we say and do affects people.It can be either physically or mentally.Words can cut deeper than a knife,and we all know that.We could have experienced it in our lives at least one.It isn't easy, dealing with those type of situation.It isn't easy, trying to heal those wounds.But we make it out of it alive, because we always have these amazing people that are always there for us.An act of kindness and support,is just that powerful.*******************************************************************************Don't pull away from the rest of the world. For those of you that are out there,with no friends,with no one to support you,those who are being neglected.You are never alone.Somewhere on this Earth, there is ALWAYS someone who is there for you.There is always someone that cares about you and feels your pain.There is always someone that will understand your story.Don't be afraid to come out of your shell.Don't be afraid to interact with people.Don't be afraid to be who you are.Dare to dream, Explore, and Love. <3 The outcomes are worth it.
author: Hina Yu
category: don-t-be-afraid, hardship-overcome, impactful, kindness, not-alone, powerful

quote: Bad stuff happens, people are mean, there are no steps you can take that ensure the world leaves you alone. All you can do is try not to be one of those people who contributes to the bad.
author: Holly Bourne, Am I Normal Yet?

quote: The Creator favors the man who loves over the man who hates.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
category: animosity, creator, divide, god, hate, hatred, kindness, love, loving, unite

quote: You celebrate what works and you take tender care of what doesn’t, with lotion, polish, and kindness.
author: Anne Lamott, Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith

quote: Instead of measuring yourself by your weight, measure yourself by your acts of kindness.
author: Elle Sommer

quote: To stay true to ourselves and remain kind to others is an art. It does require daily vigilance and, at the same time, it’s important to remember that art can often get messy.
author: Christopher Dines, The Kindness Habit: Transforming our Relationship to Addictive Behaviours
category: addiction, addiction-and-recovery, addictive-behaviour, addictiveness, boundries, kindness, self-kindness

quote: Love is donating a chunk of your life to patch up holes in the life of another.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: caring, charity, giving, helping, kindness, life, love, loving-others, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: The greatest inspiration you can find in this world is "YOU" when you help someone, encourage them, praise them, smile at them or just be kind to them that is a huge Inspiration to you and them!!
author: Angie karan
category: encouragement, help-someone, kindness, praise, the-greatest-inspiration, you

quote: Love is eternal, and growing with each breath, every kind thought, word and deed.
author: Theodore Volgoff, The Backpack

quote: There's no such thing as a problem that's yours and not mine.
author: Dara Horn, The World to Come

quote: Since most of us are just trying to figure it all out, why not be kind and considerate while on the journey?
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Be kind to yourself. Remember that when you abuse yourself, you will experience the anger, regret, and apathy of the bully as well as the depression, anxiety, and insecurity of the victim. Whatever you do, be kind to yourself.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: bullying, kindness, self-acceptance, self-compassion, self-esteem, self-judgment, self-love

quote: Every time we reach in to the cave of our loving heart and deliver an act of kindness, and touch another, we are truly sending a beautiful arrow of our love from our heart straight in to God's heart. When we purely serve another—whether it's someone hurting and confused, the cranky person at work, or the slightly strange elderly woman we help up the elevator—we are actually serving the beauty of God who lives within that person. In essence, we are magnificently surrendering to a higher and divine Love. My dear friends, lets be those beautiful instruments of that divine love. Lets open our wings and deliver small acts of everyday kindness, no matter how big or small. Remember, this divine love; is never wasted. It only flows out and becomes a great big ocean of oneness love for all
author: Angie karan

quote: Make a difference in someones life everyday. It does make a difference. Everyone has the ability to make a difference. It doesn't take much to give someone encouragement. The wheel always comes full circle, and whatever we give out will always return to us. The most meaningful acts are often the ones we commit without prompting or expectations. We have such profound power when we lend an ear, a hand, or an act of kindness
author: Angie karan
category: ability, an-act-of-kindness, angie-karan-kezos-quotes, commit-without-prompting, kindness, make-a-difference

quote: To be a better person, spend less time filling out your personal scorecard and more time being kind . . . to you.
author: Philip Chard, Nature's Ways: Experiencing the Sacred in the Natural World

quote: A most loving virtue of all, is that of a cheerful giver with the right attitude of LOVE! Giving is not just a random act of kindness. It is an investment in humanity. In return you become more than yourself, you transcend
author: Angie karan
category: a-most-loving-virtue-of-all, giving, kindness, love, transcendence, virtue

quote: The Limoges set has brought us more joy in its absence than it ever did in our cupboards. Of course, we no longer own a set of china to pass down to our kids, but that's okay. Francois and I plan on giving our children something more valuable, the simple truth that the best way to go through life is to be a major donor of kindness. We'll tell them that it's possible to own a whole bunch of beautiful, valuable things and still be miserable. But sometimes just having a recipe for chocolate Bunt cake can make a person far, far happier.
author: Firoozeh Dumas, Funny in Farsi: A Memoir of Growing Up Iranian in America

quote: I do not have respect for you who takes advantage of the soul that is kind and giving, for it is you who takes such liberties that becomes the ultimate fool.
author: C.C. Franklin

quote: Don't do something for recognition. Do it out of kindness. Do it because out of giving, it will make you whole and complete
author: Angie karan

quote: I give this freely
author: M.J. Haag, Devastation: A Beauty and the Beast Novel

quote: He was funny and charming, but also kind. It seemed the older she got, the more she appreciated kindness in people.
author: Susan Mallery, All Summer Long

quote: The question to always be in your inner dialogue, asking yourself...is it kind?
author: Eileen Anglin

quote: As the four girls were taking her father's life, she had tried to rush onto the stage. But two old university janitors held her down and whispered into her ear that she would lose her own life if she went.
author: Liu Cixin
category: china, china-sorrows, chinese-cultural-revolution, chinese-history, cultural-revolution, heroes, history-of-china, janitors, kindness

quote: Checking in on what our kids are doing online isn't helicoptering, it's parenting.
author: Galit Breen, Kindness Wins
category: cyber-bullying, cyberbullying, internet, internet-etiquette, internet-manners, kindness, kindness-quotes, kindness-to-others, online-education, online-etiquette, parenting, parenting-advice, parenting-children, parenting-quotes, parenting-teenagers, parenting-teens, social-media, teens, tweens

quote: The absolute best way to raise kind kids, is to be kind parents.
author: Galit Breen, Kindness Wins
category: cyber-bullying, cyberbullying, internet, internet-etiquette, internet-manners, kindness, kindness-quotes, kindness-to-others, online-education, online-etiquette, parenting, parenting-advice, parenting-children, parenting-quotes, parenting-teenagers, parenting-teens, social-media, teens, tweens

quote: They tell me, shaking their heads:"You should be kinder. You are somehow furious".I used to be kind. It didn’t last long.
author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: Don't do something for recognition. Do it out of kindness ..because out of giving, it will make you whole and complete.
author: Angie karan

quote: Checking in on what our kids are doing online isn't 'helicoptering,' it's 'parenting.
author: Galit Breen
category: cyber-bullying, cyberbullying, internet, internet-etiquette, internet-manners, kindness, kindness-quotes, kindness-to-others, online-education, online-etiquette, parenting, parenting-advice, parenting-children, parenting-quotes, parenting-teenagers, parenting-teens, social-media, teens, tweens

quote: He was always in a sort of fever because he was dropping behind schedule with his daily acts of kindness. However hard he tried, he'd fall behind; and then you would find him prowling about the house, setting such a clip to try and catch up with himself that Easeby was rapidly becoming a perfect hell for man and beast.
author: P.G. Wodehouse, Carry on, Jeeves

quote: Hearts of gold are heavy.
author: Jenim Dibie

quote: To teach our kids what they need to know online, we have to talk to them off line.
author: Galit Breen, Kindness Wins
category: cyber-bullying, cyberbullying, internet, internet-etiquette, internet-manners, kindness, kindness-quotes, kindness-to-others, online-education, online-etiquette, parenting, parenting-advice, parenting-children, parenting-quotes, parenting-teenagers, parenting-teens, social-media, teens, tweens

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Just a little drop of kindness can water a whole garden.
author: Heather Wolf
category: a-snowy-day, heather-wolf, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-s-joke-book-for-kiddies, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, quotes-and-saying, the-long-spring

quote: Don't let anyone fool you. The stars are always shining. And you don't just see them in the dark. The sun is a star, and it provides light for all of us.
author: Halle Teart
category: be-yourself, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, kindness, science, self-love, self-worth

quote: These people all woke up this morning and reminded themselves to be human beings. Not everyone knows how to do that. No vermin, my people. Real human beings.
author: Jami Attenberg, Saint Mazie

quote: Kindness may be the most difficult of virtues, but when I have encountered it, it has meant everything to me.
author: George Hodgman

quote: Life is a sacred shared-life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind
category: good-deeds, inspiration, kindness, life, missionary, sacred, service, sharing, volunteers

quote: Kindness knows no kind.
author: Brian Spellman, If the mind fits, shrink it

quote: Always do your best to be loving and kind to others.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk the Talking Dog
category: heather-wolf, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-s-joke-book-for-kiddies, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, love, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-sayings, loving, loving-others

quote: Just a little loving kindness is sometimes all anyone really needs.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk Visits Sea Isle
category: a-snowy-day, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-s-joke-book-for-kiddies, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, love, love-quotes, love-quotes-and-sayings, quotes-about-kindness, quotes-about-love, quotes-to-live-by, the-long-spring

quote: You may possibly become rich by just caring about yourself and what you want to gain from your profession and your life but you cannot possibly enrich the lives of everyone you meet that way.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
category: career, caring, enrichment, get-rich-quick, greed, helping-others, kindness, materialism, purpose, rasheed-ogunlaru, rasheed-ogunlaru-quotes, rich, selfishness

quote: No kindness is ever wasted, nor can we ever tell how much good may come of it.
author: Nancy Farmer, The Sea of Trolls

quote: When you love someone, you don’t care that she ate your sandwich. You only hope she found it delicious.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: kindness, love, love-quotes, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, sweetness, true-love

quote: If you don't know what to do, just be kind. You can't go wrong.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: Be gentle and kind all the time.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk's Joke Book for Kiddies
category: a-snowy-day, gentle, gentleness, gentleness-quotes, heather-wolf, kind, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, quotes-to-live-by, the-long-spring

quote: We are with ourselves 24/7, so we should try to treat ourselves with the most kindness, love and respect.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: In this world we must try to be kind to one another.
author: Heather Wolf, The Long Spring
category: a-snowy-day, heather-wolf, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, quotes-to-live-by, the-long-spring

quote: With just a little drop of kindness you can water a whole garden.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk's Joke Book for Kiddies
category: a-snowy-day, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, the-long-spring

quote: Practice loving kindness wherever you may go.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk Has a Birthday
category: a-snowy-day, kindness, kindness-quotes, kipnuk-adventure-series, kipnuk-has-a-birthday, kipnuk-the-talking-dog, kipnuk-visits-sea-isle, life-quotes, loving-kindness, quotes-to-live-by, the-long-spring

quote: What he sensed more than anything else was kindness – a kindness of a human and immediate sort. It was surprising how very radical this simple emotion could be.
author: Damon Galgut, Arctic Summer

quote: Sometimes kindness doesn’t beget anything but misery. My mother didn’t have to learn that until she was in her thirties
author: I’ve known it nearly all my life. I’m not sure which of us is better off.
category: Jessica Warman, The Last Good Day of the Year

quote: She wondered if it counted as being good if you did the good thing for purely selfish reasons. Probably not, but who cared. What was important was what you did, not how you felt.
author: Emily Gould, Friendship
category: actions, charity, feelings, good, kindness, reasons, selfish, selfless, volunteering

quote: There's a little known virtue called magnificence: an unostentatious liberality of expenditure in doing good. You would deny me the practice of it. Mierda! I should have left you on the comet.
author: Julian May, Perseus Spur

quote: No matter who’s looking at you, love, honesty, and kindness will always make you beautiful!
author: Delano Johnson, Rare Images of Love

quote: A true friend does not make you win by making you the winner to the detriment of the true winner. He makes sure that you become a loser, not because he likes the way you fail, but to enlighten you on how it feels to be treated that way and to demonstrate that love and respect are not exclusive.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: competition, failure, fairness, gain, honesty, justice, kindness, losing, love, reality-of-life, regard, respect, self-esteem, success, treatment, true-friend, true-friends, truth, unbiased, understanding, winner

quote: Well, we're originally from Glace Bay."Grandma Elsie's eyes glittered. She was looking at one of her own, a lost Cape Bretoner in need of help and offering a new story. "Tell me all about it, dear.
author: Beatrice Rose Roberts, Twin Loyalties: From the Chronicles of Tar Ponds City
category: canada, cape-breton, caper, community, glace-bay, grandma, help, kindness, legend, lost, nova-scotia, story, travel

quote: Numinous," Ursula said, breaking the silence eventually. "There's a spark of the divine in the world -- not God, er'er done with God, but something. Is it love? Not silly romantic love, but something more profound...""I think it's perhaps something we don't have a name for," Teddy said. "We want to name everything. Perhaps that's where we've gone wrong.""'And whatsoever Adam called every living creature, that was the name thereof.' Having dominion over everything has been a terrible curse."Afterwards -- because it turned out there was an afterwards for Teddy -- he resolved that he would try always to be kind. It was the best he could do. It was all that he could do. And it might be love, after all.
author: Kate Atkinson

quote: That was the thing about her. When you told her about an incident where you so badly screwed up, half expecting her to laugh at you in amusement, half anticipating a smirk of disgust, she would hardly express her pity or maybe she did express what she felt, for she would just nod her head, gesturing you to go on... As if it's normal... As if you're normal.
author: Sanhita Baruah
category: different, empathy, expressions, feelings, her, kind, kindness, life, love, misfit, normal, pity, pretty, she, smile, sweet, sympathy, understand, understanding, understood

quote: Before you step out into the world today, remember that you will encounter people whose struggles you do not know. Remember the way a pair of eyes light up when greeted with kindness.
author: D. Antoinette Foy
category: inspirational, kindness, life, people, quotes, quotes-about-life, quotes-to-live-by

quote: Home is the dearest spot on earth, and it should be the centre, though not the boundary, of the affections.
author: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: When God blesses you, the highest form of gratitude is open-handedness.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: Giving is not favor
author: it's a form of self-reparation.

quote: Greatness isn't worldly fame and success. Laying humble service for humanity's best is true greatness.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: We are all citizens of the world and we owe it to the world to make it a better place.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: Even Karma rewards generosity. The good that you do must surely catch up with you!
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: Giving is a necessary good
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
category: charity, giving, kindness, love, tags-generosity, truth

quote: For every good deed done, a blessing is waiting to be born!
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue
category: charity, giving, kindness, love, tags-generosity, truth

quote: Giving is recieving
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: A kind soul knows impoliteness is just preoccupied with distraction.
author: Mike Dolan

quote: What will I do when you're gone?" said Alasdair, with a faltering voice.Bryeison placed a hand on his shoulder and said, with raging tranquility, "Do what is good and what is right.
author: Michelle Franklin

quote: Be kind to yourself and others.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Rare is the man who seeks not only to heal himself but to heal his fellow man.
author: José N. Harris, Mi Vida
category: caring, caring-for-others, healing, kindness, man, rare, rarely

quote: I'm an answer, Frankie. Maybe you're an answer for me, too?—Emerson
author: Liza M. Wiemer, Hello?
category: caring, friendship, helping-others, kind-heart, kindness, liza-wiemer, phone-conversation, relationships, sharing-life, sharing-pain

quote: Everyone you meet is hurt, broken and fighting a hard battle. Please don’t be an ass.
author: Sarvesh Jain, Naked Wisdom of the child

quote: For some reason, Beck's unexpected kindness was hard to bear - it made tears prick my eyes where Jack's threats hadn't.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, Shiver

quote: So by keeping her word, Frieda B. made amends. And the two who'd been strangers became best of friends.
author: Renata Bowers, Frieda B. Meets the Man in the Moon
category: conflict-resolution, friendship, honesty, kindness, making-amends, the-golden-rule

quote: You'd be teary, too, yes you would be," he said, "if a girl and her bed had crashed into your head.
author: Renata Bowers, Frieda B. Meets the Man in the Moon
category: adventure, conflict, conflict-resolution, dreams, friendship, honesty, kindness, making-amends, the-golden-rule

quote: We can only diffuse kindness, to the souls filled with bitterness
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: One kind word can warm three winter months.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: That was when I learned that kindness could break a heart just as sure as meanness. The difference was the kindness made that broken heart softer. Meanness just made the heart want to be hard.
author: Susie Finkbeiner, A Cup of Dust: a Novel of the Dust Bowl

quote: Use your voice for good in this world, it may not seem like it's getting you anywhere, but in the end good wins.
author: Heather Wolf, Kipnuk the Talking Dog

quote: Beware of those who are stingy, for they would rather sting you than give you anything.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
category: generosity, generous, give, giving, kindness, needy, selfish, selfishness, stinginess, stingy, taking

quote: What is love?It's not empathy, nor kindness.Empathy takes two, the one who hurts and the one who empathizes.Kindness takes two, the one who gives and the one who takes.But love takes just one.The two get together into one.They don't separate.The "I" and the "you" disappear.I LOVE MEANS I DISAPPEAR..
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: If kindness is beauty, patience is disarming elegance.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: beauty, grace, kindness, patience, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: May you find help when you need it most.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: christian-life, good-deeds, help, helping-others, helplessness, hope, kindness, need, service, volunteers

quote: We were all victims of the arbitrary nature of a totalitarian regime that constantly intruded into the most private corners of our lives and imposed its relentless fictions on us. Was this rule the rule of Islam? What memories were we creating for our children? This constant assault, this persistent lack of kindness, was what frightened me most.
author: Azar Nafisi, Reading Lolita in Tehran

quote: Tiny acts of kindness can have BIG results.
author: Elizabeth Bourgeret

quote: People think kindness is a soft, weak, submissive influence when in reality it is the most potent, persuasive force in existence.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: gentleness, influence, influential, kind, kindness, nice, persuasive, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Do you not think, Mrs. Givings, that snow is always kind? Because it has to fall slowly, to meet the ground slowly, or the eyelash slowly— And things that meet each other slowly are kind.
author: Sarah Ruhl, In the Next Room, or the vibrator play

quote: At times we feel outnumbered in our attempts to improve the world—to brighten and beautify, to preserve and heal and do what’s best for humanity. Selfless efforts can start to feel beleaguering, discouraging, even pointless with so little support. It is at these times I remind myself that I would rather be the last Good Samaritan standing than to join the ranks of selfish multitudes creating misery.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: charity, good-samaritan, help, helping, humanitarian, kindness, misery, reaching-out, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, selfish-people

quote: There are hundreds of reasons to be kind, but only one that matters—because it’s who you are.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: be-kind, kind, kindness, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, who-you-are

quote: Kindness is not entered onto the great ledger of civilisation.
author: Matthew De Abaitua, If Then

quote: Teddy bears, not grizzly bears, get invited in for honey.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: be-kind, grizzly-bears, grouchiness, grouchy, kind, kindness, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, teddy-bears

quote: Don’t just act with kindness, think with kindness.
author: Elaina Marie, Happiness is Overrated - Live the Inspired Life Instead

quote: We've decided to wake a miss for you because you are nice. We want a booby as roomful as ours."Everybody had seen the Hobgoblin laugh, but nobody believed he could smile. He was so happy that you could see it all over him -- from his hat to his boots! Without a word he waved his cloak over the grass -- and behold! Once more the garden was filled with a pink light and there on the grass before them lay a twin to the King's Ruby -- the Queen's Ruby.
author: Tove Jansson, Finn Family Moomintroll
category: generosity, hobgoblin, kindness, king-s-ruby, precious-stones, wishes-fulfilled

quote: We must encourage, support and comfort one another.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: advice, christian-living, coexistence, encourage, faith, good-deeds, humanity, inspire, kindness, motivational, people, uplifting

quote: Everything passed, and what trace of its passage remained? It seemed to Kitty that they were all, the human race, like the drops of water in that river and they flowed on, each so close to the other and yet so far apart, a nameless flood, to the sea. When all things lasted so short a time and nothing mattered very much, it seemed pitiful that men, attaching an absurd importance to trivial objects, should make themselves and one another so unhappy.
author: W. Somerset Maugham, The Painted Veil
category: happiness, human-race, humanity, kindness, metaphor, triviality-of-life

quote: Your wealth or status doesn't make you. Your kindness and character does.
author: Venkat Desireddy

quote: Whoever said kindness should be earned is wrong. A kick in the shins is earned - kindness should be a given.
author: Jodi Ann Bickley

quote: Remember the many compartments of the heart, the seed of what is possible. So much of who we are is defined by the places we hold for each other. For it is not our ingenuity that sets us apart, but our capacity for love, the possibility our way will be lit by grace. Our hearts prisms, chiseling out the colors of pure light.
author: Kare Anderson, Getting What You Want: 2how to Reach Agreement and Resolve Conflict Every Time

quote: Daniel studied her face. Have you ever thanked God for giving you the advantages he has? Advantages?All those things I've already mentioned. Your tall and strong, loyal and brave, kind and loving. You stand out in a crowd and your a leader. He wouldn't trust those qualities with just anyone. He must love you a great deal.
author: Colleen Coble, Safe in His Arms
category: brave, kindness, leader, loving, loyal, standing-out, strong-female-characters, tall

quote: Some men are more easily broken by kindness than censure.
author: Patrick W. Carr, A Cast of Stones

quote: But for better or worse, I am not motivated by kindness.
author: Suzanne Collins, Mockingjay

quote: As Chris Granger, executive vice president at the NBA, explains, "Talented people are attracted to those who care about them. When you help someone get promoted out of your team, it's a short-term loss, but it's a clear long-term gain. It's easier to attract people, because word gets around that your philosophy is to help people.
author: Adam Grant

quote: History is so comprehensive and detailed. I couldn't be a history student. I thought there was a time when I couldn't be a history maker, because of my limited understanding of what that meant. Today, thinking about the passing of Julian Bond and a wonderful conversation with a woman who has influenced so much, I think we all are history makers. All of our names will not be as known as Mr. Bond's or in books, but our names will be on someone's tongue and our memories will be in someone's heart, and we will all be a part of someone's personal story. We have a unique opportunity at this very second to change how we affect someone's life as living history and historians. Flaws and all. Yep.
author: Robin Caldwell
category: goodness, historians, history, influencer, inspiration, julian-bond, kindness, mentoring-quotes

quote: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, self-control; against such things there is no law.
author: Galatians 5:22-23

quote: Polly tried to conquer the bad feeling; but it worried her, till she remembered something her mother once said to her: "When you feel out of sorts, try to make someone else happy, and you will soon be so yourself.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: In the end, the only thing that really matters is how we treated all living things.
author: Ka Chinery, Perceptions from the Photon Frequency: The Ascended Version
category: altruism, death, immortality, kindness, life, living-well, the-end

quote: Kind words can heal and harsh words can kill
author: Beta Metani' Marashi

quote: Kindness is all we have to give others
author: Kimberley Freeman, Wildflower Hill

quote: I don’t know what I would have done if they had hugged me. I probably would have frozen in place, become stiff. It took most of my life to overcome my distaste for physical contact and not to stiffen when I was touched, or flinch, twitch, fidget, and eventually figure out how to move away. I learned to accept being hugged by my children when they were infants. Their joy at seeing me enter a room was real and filled with true love and affection and it showed in their embraces. Like a convert, when I learned the joy and comfort of being hugged by and hugging those I loved, I became a regular practitioner.
author: John William Tuohy, No Time to Say Goodbye: A Memoir of a Life in Foster Care

quote: Don’t try to please others at the expense of your values and your integrity. At the end of the day, you want to like yourself when you look in a mirror.
author: Millen Livis
category: authenticity, beliefs, geneous, generocity, honesty, integrity, kind, kindness, love, peace, soul, values, yourself

quote: Right on the other side of our fears resides hope and happiness. We get stuck in our lives afraid to walk over there when it’s a much kinder place.
author: Ron Baratono

quote: We have probably all seen teachers who would pick a student up by the scruff of the neck for saying ‘Shit,’ but who would walk by without a word when overhearing that same student taunting a classmate, calling him a ‘fag.’ It is often easier not to intervene — even when there is a clear-cut victim. It’s out in the hall. It isn’t our business. It isn’t our problem.But our inactions, like our actions, define who we are and what are true values are.
author: Richard H. Eyster
category: actions, bullying, cruelty, discipline, gay, gay-baiting, intervention, kindness, not-our-problem, teacher, values, victimization

quote: Every opportunity with another was an opportunity to serve my fellow man. Every moment alone was a chance to grow and become more of who I already was. I instantly felt how great a life could be, and that was only made possible by service toward others.
author: Chris Matakas, My Mastery: Continued Education Through Jiu Jitsu

quote: The ability to extend kindness requires an other-awareness. We are apt to miss the needs of those around us if we remain self-focused. Helping children to see the needs of others will bless them with perspective on their own lives, as well as propel them toward good works that display the kindness of God.
author: Melissa B. Kruger, Walking with God in the Season of Motherhood: An Eleven-Week Devotional Bible Study

quote: The world must begin sharing again. We need more kindness. -Takua Kawirembeyju, Guarani Shaman of Paraguay
author: Nancy Connor, Shamans of the World

quote: Even small gestures of kindness have the potential to reap enormous rewards. Only the shortsighted man believes otherwise.
author: Erika Johansen, The Invasion of the Tearling

quote: Remember your grandpa’s saying: kill them with kindness.
author: C.B. Cook, Paralyzed Dreams

quote: Love is a battle with yourself. Be kind and love yourself before you love anyone else.
author: Karen Quan, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Understand your driving force, whether you're operating out of fear or love. When we operate in fear, we tend to hold back and not get the most from life. When we operate in love, we open new avenues and experience life more abundantly.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Sweet Destiny
category: faith, fear, happiness, honesty, hope, inspiration, inspirational-quotes, kindness, life, love, quotes, truth, words-to-live-by

quote: He has told you, O man, what is good; and what does the LORD require of you but to do justice, and to love kindness, and to walk humbly with your God? Micah 6:8
author: Anonymous, The Holy Bible: English Standard Version

quote: But you are too lovely even to care to be kind as others are.
author: Thomas Hardy, Far from the Madding Crowd
category: bathsheba-everdene, beauty, far-from-the-madding-crowd, kindness, sergeant-troy, thomas-hardy, vanity

quote: Now anybody can be "kind." And everybody's supposed to be. Except that long ago it was something you were born into and couldn't help. Now it's just a faked-up attitude half the time, like teachers the first day of class.
author: Robert M. Pirsig, Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values

quote: Kindness expressed to a stranger is kindness expressed to God.
author: Virginia Lieto

quote: If I could bottle kindness, I wonder if formaldehyde would preserve it.
author: Amanda Mosher, Better to be able to love than to be loveable

quote: Such a simple thing, kindness. Such a simple thing. A nice word of encouragement, given when needed. An act of friendship. A passing smile.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: Always try to be a little kinder than necessary.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: To be kind is to respond with sensitivity and human warmth to the hopes and needs of others. Even the briefest touch of kindness can lighten a heavy heart. Kindness can change the lives of people"~ Aung Sun Suu Kyi
author: Aung Sun Suu Kyi
category: forget, isnot, kind, kindness, never-ever, tobe, weakness

quote: Does he expect the flood to just move out of his way if he asks nicely?
author: Tanya Huff, The Quartered Sea

quote: And it was then that I realized that families might be the ones who pick us up time and again but strangers also rescue us-even if they don't know they're doing so.
author: Martin Pistorius

quote: It's not enough to be kind. One should be kinder than needed. Why I love that line, that concept, is that it reminds me that we carry with us, as human beings, not just the capacity to be kind, but the very choice of kindness. And what does that mean? How is that measured? You can't use a yardstick. It's like I was saying just before: it's not like measuring how much you've grown in a year. It's not exactly quantifiable, is it?
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: What you did was not only very kind, but brave and honorable.
author: Peter Cimino, The Four Corners, a Sicilian Story

quote: Be a kind person. Yes, even to jerks. Let them be a jerk. You be a kind person.
author: Karen Salmansohn
category: bullying, hate, inspirational, kindness, love, resentment

quote: A Princess has beautiful manners no matter who she’s dealing with. She would never stoop to being brusque when giving a burger order, or shouting at the barista who forgot her syrup shot. When we behave like true Princesses, people enjoy serving us, because they’re more likely to get a sympathetic smile instead of a complaint about the long wait.
author: Rosie Blythe, The Princess Guide to Life

quote: Wisdom tells us that the best time for silence is when we are mad or upset.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: As a success-minded person, you should always be looking to not only do your job but do it with excellence and go the extra mile.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Let your heroes be known. Give praise and honor to those to whom it is rightly due. Spend more time posting stories about heroes than you do about the wrongs in the world. When we know about heroes and we see those who perform heroic acts, we too want to be heroes. There is a hero in all of us. Heroes are important.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Success-minded people must understand that the use of profane and obscene words have no place in their vocabulary.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: No matter who it is or what you think of them, never rejoice in the pain of others. It lowers you to a level you should not be at.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: We are all different and we all have a different sense of humor.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Keep the personal, personal and do not be guilty of spreading bad feelings.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Trustworthiness is a mark of a success-minded person. To be seen as trustworthy is a great compliment. When people trust you, they expect that you will honor their trust.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Not everyone will support every mission or work, you can still enjoy their friendship. No one likes to feel that the only reason you are friends is what you can get out of them.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: If you want friends you must be friendly. Always complaining and posting negative comments is not going to bring you friends. No one likes to get puked on.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Gossip has always been a problem. It is one of the most powerful, addictive behaviors there is. As long as the human race has had a common language they have used it to gossip.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Remember that people who seek to do evil can play hit and miss all they want. People who are seeking companionship online have to be right every time. Miss out on this one and the price could be very dear, even costing your life.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: By no means do I think that playing games online is wrong or rude. However, constantly sending requests is an act of bad manners as well as being very annoying to the one receiving them.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: It is rudeness of the highest order to hit a family when they are down.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Remember this, posting pictures are like speaking words, you cannot take them back.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: If you are going to share something with a person, first look on their social media accounts and see how they have handled other people trust. If someone has shared the secrets of others, they will share yours.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Okay, I cannot say this without being very direct. If you are looking for a spouse or even a romance through social media, you are looking for trouble.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Posting something that is encouraging and well done compared to something that is trashy and common is the difference between eating a fine meal or the scraps from making that meal.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Be a blessing to all you are connecting with on social media. Encourage, rejoice and celebrate with each and every one. You will find that it will do wonders for your own attitude as well as those who may struggle with a negative mind-set.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Success-minded people know that first and foremost, in all we do, we must think of others first. By thinking of others, how they feel and what they need, will not cost you a thing nor will it lessen what you have to say.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Positive people on the other had are not those who deny what is going on around them for some pie-in-the-sky type of thinking. Positive people are very award of the problems, disasters and difficulties that are happening all around them. What they do not do is give into defeat.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: If someone is trying to share a laugh and you personally do not find it funny, then just move on and leave it alone. Do not steal someone else’s humor.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Heroes show us courage, honor, integrity and strength. Now more than ever, we need heroes.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: We have gotten so use to humor being something nasty and offensive that we started to believe that was the only way to get a laugh.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: To be truly grateful for the kindness of other and to have those you love in your life is a great and powerful emotion.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: The rules from those who are politically correct restrict what you can say to or about anything in our daily life. They tell you what to call others and what others can call you.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: It is not the job for those who are angry about the events of the day to strike out and post things that they hope will incite anger in others as well. Do not sell your social media friends short as far as their ability to find the news for themselves.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Everybody oughta have a dog," he said thoughtfully, his hand still scratching Beau. "Dogs teach you love and kindness. They remind you what's important." He nodded and took a sip of his coffee. "A life ain't much of a life without a dog in it, s'what I always said.
author: Dan Gemeinhart, The Honest Truth

quote: Right from the moment of our birth, we are under the care and kindness of our parents. Later on in life, when we are oppressed by sickness and become old, we are again dependent on the kindness of others. Since we are dependent on the kindness of others at the beginning and end of our lives, then how can we neglect projecting kindness towards others in the middle of our lives, when it is our best time to share it?
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
category: baby, compassion-quotes, elderly, kind, kindness, kindness-quotes, life-quotes, old, suzy-kassem-quotes, wisdom-of-suzy-kassem, young

quote: But there are times," said Charlotte, "when it is necessary and an act of friendship to write nothing rather than not to write.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Elective Affinities

quote: So many of the world's problems, he mused, were solved by sheer human decency.
author: Maggie Stiefvater, The Dream Thieves

quote: I am getting tired of feeling disappointed. I am getting tired of other people trying to always take my kindness for weakness, I sure don't deserve it. I should assume responsibility and become cold to others and warm to myself. Some call it self loving, other selfishness... I call it respect. Why to give less that what is being given? Maybe I am way too much for you, maybe that is your biggest fear, to feel less.
author: Andres Oliver
category: break-ups, disappointment, kindness, love, relationships, self-esteem, self-love-quotes

quote: Every decision you ever make has its own consequences. Freedom is not the issue. You have freedom to do what you want, you just cannot do it and not pay the price for it.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, decisions, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: If people were kinder, the world might cease weeping.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: kind, kindness, kindness-quotes, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich

quote: Kindness is a language more often misunderstood than taken at face value.
author: Joyce Rachelle

quote: With those who are kindthe sage is kindWith those who are not kindthe sage is also kindbecause the way of Tao is kindness
author: Lao Tzu

quote: be kind, even when others are not, It empowers them to become a better version of themselves.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: Perhaps all the dragons of your life are princesses, who are only waiting for us to show a little beauty and courage. Perhaps at the very bottom every horror is something helpless, that wants help from us
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Letters to a Young Poet

quote: Good manners is just being respectful of others. Whether you know them or not, you should show respect for all people.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Everything has a consequence to it.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Posting your thoughts on any social media site is like telling you most deeply held secret to the town gossip. Not a wise move.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Please hold onto your kindess, we share the world with many selfish beings And we need open hearts to create change.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: We watch death and destruction on TV, in movies, over the news and online so much that it is just a part of our lives. It was never meant to be that way. In the end, we have paid a heavy price for our curiosity.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Social media is just that - social.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: And kindness is a weakness. I can see that now. But it's a weakness I'm still not sure I'd want to give up entirely .
author: Kallypso Masters, Nobody's Dream

quote: It seems that the days of public modesty and concern about how we look are far from us. I will not say they are gone forever, in culture nothing is forever.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: What goes out always returns
author: remember to be kind to yourself.

quote: I believe that when a person has hope in the future, believe in their ability to achieve and understand that God made them for a purpose, then they will, in the end, and achieve great things.
author: John Patrick Hickey, Oops! Did I Really Post That
category: civility, etiquette, kindness, manners, personal-development, social-media, success

quote: Sit with me, and I'll not be alone.Hold my hand, and I'll not feel alone.Cry with me, and I'll no longer suffer alone.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: charity, cry, empathy, giving, hardships, holding-hands, kindness, loneliness, lonely, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, service, suffering, suffering-of-humanity, sympathy

quote: True devotion and humility is when you carelessly allow yourself to fall in love with things you consider will make you look inferior, which in essence, makes you superior.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: acceptance, achilles-heel, admiration, affection, careless, defeat, devotion, downfall, endurance, essence, faith, funny-but-true, grass-to-grace, hero, humble-beginning, humility, inferior, kindness, lion-heart, love, poison, reckless, self-surrender, sensitivity, soft-spot, strong, submission, superior, sympathy, truth, vulnerable

quote: Kind words and tender affections will not save me from this lake of woe and misery, but they may be enough of a buoy to prevent my drowning.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: affection, affections, charity, help, helping-others, kind-words, kindness, rescue, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, save

quote: Even more than the time when she gave birth, a mother feels her greatest joy when she hears others refer to her son as a wise learned one.
author: Thiruvalluvar, Thirukkural
category: affection, clever, education, enlightenment, intelligent, joyousness, kindness, learned, love, mother, sagacious, sage, son, wise

quote: Reading and writing are not education if they do not help people to be kind to all creatures
author: John Ruskin

quote: Sometimes "No" is the kindest word.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: guilt, kind-words, kindness, saying-no, saying-no-is-okay, self-respect

quote: If you start each day happy and treat people with more kindness, it determines the way you live your day. It's all about your choices!
author: Wesam Fawzi

quote: Every act of kindness is another step up Heaven’s stairway.
author: Donald L. Hicks, Look into the stillness

quote: They truly embodied goodness and generosity – like angels sent to save me in my hour of greatest need. Mohammed had risked everything to keep a promise to my father. He and his family saved not only my life, but also my faith in others.
author: Zack Love, The Syrian Virgin
category: bonds, contemporary, faith, goodness, hope, kindness, life, people, syria

quote: I wouldn't give you two cents for all your fancy rules if behind them they didn't have a little bit of plain ordinary everyday kindness, and a little looking out for the other fellow, too.
author: Sidney Buchman

quote: To someone you may be their only sunlight
author: so don't dim the light. Keep shinning.

quote: Some people are crazy in love. They are so captivated to where they've lost themselves. Do not be lured in so deep that you lose the essence of who you truly are.
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Sweet Destiny
category: adults, affection, crazy, essence, hope, infatuation, inspiration, inspire, inspired, kindness, life, love, people, quotes, you

quote: Why are you doing this?” Amanvah whispered, her accent thick like her mother’s, but every word clear. “My mother would not be so kind to one who tried to poison her.”“Nor would mine, but we are not our mothers, Amanvah,” Leesha said.
author: Peter V. Brett, The Desert Spear

quote: He looked up at her. Kindness was something he didn't even know he wanted, and here it was.
author: Marilynne Robinson, Lila

quote: Talking with the mouth of a beast won't ease your pain.
author: Andrew Davidson, The Gargoyle

quote: Don't worry about the water," said a man with a nervous grin. "This is hardwood, it won't ruin. You'll have this chair into your old years. How much do you have? I'll take anything. My children need to eat."A few of the businessmen like Mister Mangochi bought things they later gave back. But most people had no money. They simply shrugged and shook their heads.
author: William Kamkwamba, The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind: Creating Currents of Electricity and Hope

quote: let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.
author: Victoria Bando

quote: Real popularity is taking the time to love others, reaching out, and never being afraid to be the first one dancing. REMEMBER THE GIRL IN PEARLS.
author: Maya Van Wagenen
category: inspirational, kindness, life, loving-others, popularity, teenage, wisdom

quote: Wealth without virtue is no harmless neighbor.
author: Sappho, A Garland: The Poems and Fragments of Sappho

quote: Kindness is gracious demonstrate sensitivity and human warmth.
