quote: I can only run as fast as the rate of my breath.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: life, life-experience, motivaiton, thoughts, wisdom, wisdom-of-lailah-gifty-akita

quote: Have you ever had so many thoughts churning inside that you didn’t dare let them escape, in case they blew you wide open
author: Ellen Hopkins, Crank

quote: The greater the volume of thoughts you have to work with, the better the context you can create for developing options and trusting your choices.
author: David    Allen, Getting Things Done: The Art of Stress-Free Productivity

quote: All things remarkable are surprisingly simple
author: albeit difficult to find.

quote: When I finally lie down, I find sleep elusive. The same thoughts that trouble me during the day are only compounded by the stillness of night.
author: Brandon Sanderson, The Well of Ascension
category: elusive, night, rest, sleep, stillness, thoughts, wakeful-night, wakefulness

quote: Poetry has saved me on occasions when people couldn't.
author: Sanober  Khan
category: emotions, people, poetry, poetry-love, poetry-quotes, poets, thoughts, writers

quote: Thoughts can be easily expressed by words but feelings are very hard to express by words.
author: Luffina Lourduraj

quote: But more important than the food I put into my body are thoughts I put into my mind. Thoughts of bitterness like, “I hate her!” Thoughts of despair like, “I'll never be happy again.” Thoughts of fear like, “I could never do that!” And thoughts of worry, thoughts of greed and thoughts of self-loathing…“I’m so stupid.” A constant diet of these killer thoughts will destroy any of us long before heart burn or cholesterol.
author: Steve Goodier
category: esteem, self-esteem, self-talk, self-worth, thinking, thoughts

quote: God has sent us with treasure of thoughts, we just need to explore that
author: Samar Sudha

quote: It's not the weather that's bad or good, it's whether you have good or bad mood. It's cloudy and cold, I feel happy and bold, As the storm unfolds, I turn silver in gold!
author: Ana Claudia Antunes, A-Z of Happiness: Tips for Living and Breaking Through the Chain that Separates You from Getting That Dream Job
category: alchemy, attitude, gold, happiness, mood, motivation, storm, thoughts, weather

quote: We solely choose how we interpret something said, a behavior or action of another. No one can make us feel anything we don’t choose for ourselves.
author: Renee Cefalu

quote: Sometimes, we think faster than what we write.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: advice, mindset, sharing-life, story-writing, think, thoughts, wisdom-of-lailah-gifty-akita, wise-words, write, writing

quote: He created the way out, and He leads us to the way out, but it certainly isn't easy.
author: Mirriam Neal, Monster

quote: Time is time. You cannot replay time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: I don’t want to talk as much,’ she said, denting her chin thoughtfully with her forefinger. ‘It’s nicer to think dear, pretty thoughts and keep them in one’s heart, like treasures.
author: L.M. Montgomery, Anne of Green Gables

quote: Struggles put you in a position to make better decisions. You'll survive and should take the lessons learned especially in order to move forward in life. It may have been raining in your life for a moment, but the sun will shine again
author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana, Release The Ink
category: inspiration, inspirational, lessons, life, live, love, quotes, quotes-to-live-by, struggles, thoughts, wisdom, words-of-wisdom

quote: I savored every yes, every more, every oh, every there, every please. I wanted every one of her words. I knew what it was not to have them— I’d never take them for granted.
author: Louise Bay, Calling Me Away

quote: Drunk words are sober thoughts
author: Asmaa Ed-dahri, Chasing Happiness

quote: If you open the flood gates of thought you do not know what may come. You may discover that you are better than you thought or worse than the devil himself
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom
category: reality-of-life, thinking-quotes, thought, thoughtful, thoughtfulness, thoughts, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-on-life

quote: Strong thoughts are accompanied by great emotions
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

quote: Thoughts are like things carried by a river. Capture the best while you can, after they have gone, you have to run after them and if per chance you find them, they are distorted
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom
category: philosophy, philosophy-quotes, reason, reasoning, reasons-why, think, thinking, thinking-quotes, thought, thought-process, thought-processing, thoughts, thoughts-for-life, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-on-life, thoughts-quotes

quote: There is hope for you when your opinions are in opposition to those of the majority. Your brain mighty be working as it was meant to.
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom
category: philosophy, philosophy-quotes, reason, reasoning, reasons-why, think, thinking, thinking-quotes, thought, thought-process, thought-processing, thoughts, thoughts-for-life, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-on-life, thoughts-quotes

quote: Unexamined thoughts, habits or action may offer some deceptive gain or pleasure but eventually it takes away something most valuable from our life ,which we have ever wished for.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: Life can end any time, any day.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

quote: Thoughts are nothing but cause and effect.
author: Vaibhav Mukim, Logicops

quote: aphorism 129:I would have every thought stoop and touch the Earth but that I already know the impossibility of the effort. A thought seems to have a life of its own and would rather leave itself open to flattering interpretations.
author: Matt Berry, A Human Strategy: Toward a Genuine Spirituality, Second Edition

quote: There is neither replay of time nor life.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: christian-life, daily-motivation, death, death-notes, educational-philosophy, eternal-life, inspirational, life, love, memories, moment, philosophy, souls, thoughts, time, time-travel, wisdom

quote: Changing your attitude, your outlook, your mindset, perspective, disposition, or mood—they all mean controlling where you allow your thoughts to linger.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
category: attitude, change, disposition, mindset, mood, perspective, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, thoughts

quote: Writing is a kind of repository and can help create a space for the accommodation of new thoughts and feelings. If you don't write these stories down, your heart will be filled up and broken by them.
author: Xinran, The Good Women of China: Hidden Voices

quote: nothing is wrong and nothing is right in this world, it's all about the matter of justification only.
author: rishi_328

quote: The divine thoughts comes from God, we are only vessel for its transmission.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: advice-to-writers, calling-people, chosen-people, divine, god, laila, learner, lifelong-education, saved, saved-by-grace, saved-from-sin, thoughts, writers-life, writing-advice, writing-life

quote: And I think, if thoughts are worth a penny, how much less promises must be worth. Especially the ones you're likely to break.
author: Neal Shusterman, Challenger Deep

quote: …in the library…surrounded by things far more dangerous than what roamed the school corridors. For here thoughts were housed.
author: Louise Penny, Bury Your Dead

quote: We have everything within us for our greatness and for our destruction. It comes back to what we think about.
author: Tony Curl

quote: Don’t believe everything you think.
author: Marci Shimoff

quote: She had realized that she was not as weak and helpless as thought she had been – she was willing to fight for her dreams and do whatever was necessary to make them come true.
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: Everything you think, feel, say, and do contains seeds of more of itself.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: The chair and desk and stuff, they change in the darkness. Like people change. And I lay in my bed and I think, you know, this is the way the chair really is. The way it looks in the daytime, that's just a foolie. It looks that way to make me think it's all right. But it's an ugly thing, a chair at night is. And I know even in the day that it's ugly underneath. It will be ugly again, when I'm alone with it. When it's dark...I'm scared of chairs... I try not to be scared of things. I try to fight it. But I'm not good at it. It's everywhere at once. It's like fighting the night.
author: Torey L. Hayden, Murphy's Boy

quote: Life is simply beautiful and too short to shed tears for something which was never yours. It was time to move on.
author: Anamika Mishra, VoiceMates - A Novel

quote: When Bad People start doing Good things with bad motives
author: bad people wont become Good people but the World will start doubting the Goodness of Good Things!

quote: Madame Chantal―a large woman whose ideas always strike me as being square-shaped, like stones dressed by a mason―was in the habit of concluding any political discussion with the remark: 'As ye sow, so shall ye reap'. Why have I always imagined that Madame Chantal's ideas are square? I've no idea, but everything she says goes into that shape in my mind: a block―a large one―with four symmetrical angles.
author: Guy de Maupassant, A Day in the Country and Other Stories

quote: If you can't turn off your thoughts, who cares how soft your pillow is?"- David King
author: Robert Liparulo, Watcher in the Woods

quote: When you stress out, things will stress out around you. Always control your thoughts and pacify any unnecessary stress. Control your vibrations and you are the master of your own harmony.
author: Suzy Kassem, Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem
category: bliss, control, control-your-thoughts, energies, energy, frustration, frustration-quotes, harmony, healing, inner-peace, mind-control, peace, peace-of-mind, stress, stressing-out, suzy-kassem, thoughts, vibrations

quote: Mom used to say that the thoughts in our heads were nothing more than electrical impulses. I remember Dad and her talking about this over dinner. It frustrated Dad that the human brain can fire electrical sparks and think, but that the electricity he’d pump into an android brain would never give it independent thought. The body isn’t that different from a machine. Humans and androids both run on electricity.That lightning spark of energy I saw in the reverie.That was my mother’s last thought, an echo of electricity, something that sparked when I entered her dreamscape.That spark is gone now. Her life is gone now. Everything that made her, her, is gone now. Faded into nothing.
author: Beth Revis, The Body Electric
category: death, dreams, electricity, independent, life, spark, talk, thoughts

quote: By talking to yourself every hour of the day, you can direct yourself to think thoughts of courage and happiness, thoughts of power and peace. By talking to yourself about the things you have to be grateful for, you can fill your mind with thoughts that soar and sing.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Once we are lost unto ourselves, everything else is lost to us.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, The Sorrows of Young Werther

quote: The animals haven't split apart into what they think and what they feel. They are whole and trust in their instincts.
author: Bryn  Hammond, Amgalant Two: Tribal Brawls

quote: The only true thoughts are those which do not grasp their own meaning
author: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: You might think of a thought as an invisible, innocuous little thing. Something that barely exists. But a thought is something hard to conceal. Hold a thought and it melts all over your hands. Touch something else and now you’ve left traces of it. Hide it under your shirt and it bleeds through.
author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls, Waking Up at Rembrandt's
category: artists, free-thinkers, freedom-of-thought, thinking, thoughts, troublemakers

quote: The fear of Mortality is the base of Immortality
author: Udayveer Singh
category: art, base, death, fear, i-am-immortal, immortal, immortality, life, mortal, mortality, thoughts, writing

quote: David looked at her and smiled. "I think you have to feel comfortable being alone with yourself before you truly know who you are and can feel comfortable being yourself with others.
author: Steven Manchesterchester

quote: Spending time with her father was like showering with a cheese grate - it got more painful each time.
author: Steven Manchester, Gooseberry Island

quote: Dr. Weiss stood. "There are two things you need to know right off the bat: The first is that it takes great courage to admit fear or that you need hep. Just by being here, you've proven that you have the courage. And the second id that we never get what we wish for - ever." He shrugged. "We get what we work for." He looked into David's eyes. "Are you prepared to put in the work, David McClain?
author: Steven Manchester, Gooseberry Island

quote: An action made by an unwitting man, shall not define, nor justify a common thought or interpretation.
author: Even Engesland
category: action, actions, common, define, definition, interpretation, justice, man, mankind, retribution, thought, thoughts, unwitting

quote: The thoughts you think every day determines the life you lead tomorrow
author: Steven Aitchison

quote: The more exclusive you make yourself in thought and emotion, the more excluded from life you become.
author: Sadghuru

quote: If the human brain is really capable of having 60,000 to 80,000 thoughts per day, Brent was living proof, because he never stopped thinking.
author: Kenneth Eade, Predatory Kill

quote: People think of all kinds of things at three in the morning. We all do. That's why we each have to figure out our own way of fighting it off.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: I can decide how I spend my time, whom I interact with, whom I share my bodyand life and money and energy with. I can select what I eat and read and study. I can choose how I’m going to regard unfortunate circumstances in my life—whether I will see them as curses or opportunities (and on the occasions when I can’t rise to the most optimistic viewpoint, because I’m feeling too damn sorry for myself, I can choose to keep trying to change my outlook). I can choose my words and the tone of voice in which I speak to others. Andmost of all, I can choose my thoughts.you need to learn how to select your thoughts just the same way you select what clothes you’re gonna wear every day. This is a power you can cultivate. If you want to control things in your life so bad, work on the mind. That’s the only thing you should be trying to control.Drop everything else but that. Because if you can’t learn to master your thinking, you’re indeep trouble forever
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: A man becomes unrighteous just because of his unholy thoughts but graduates to become a wicked by bringing his unholy thoughts into practice.
author: Santosh Thankachan

quote: An action made by an unwitting man, shall not define, nor justify a common thought and interpretation.
author: Even Engesland
category: action, actions, common, define, definition, etc, inspirational, interpretation, justice, man, mankind, retribution, science, thought, thoughts, unwitting

quote: The sky was a feather blanket of clouds, save for one blue hole in the fabric. A blue cloud in a white sky.
author: Marie Rutkoski, The Winner's Crime

quote: She thought it was strange that the mere sensation of savouring the prospect of something could make her think for a while that is must be the prospect of home.
author: Colm Tóibín, Brooklyn

quote: My foggy brain slid away and— And I was still dressed in only my bra and panties. Well, at least it’s a nice set of bra and panties. Yep, these were the thoughts going through my brain as I looked at a photo of a decapitated head on my bed.
author: Kelley Armstrong, Visions
category: concussion, decapitated-head, humor, olivia, thoughts, underwear

quote: I look at Ben now. And again I wonder how it is that we can feel so many of the same things and be so utterly different.
author: Gayle Forman, I Was Here

quote: I was like a thought slipping through the fissures...
author: Dean Koontz, Odd Apocalypse

quote: Once you think a thought, it is extremely difficult to unthink it. And I had thought the thought.
author: John Green, Let It Snow: Three Holiday Romances

quote: We become what we think!" (Philippians 4:8,9)
author: Earl Nightengale

quote: The hit and run of thoughts on ideas is a havoc.
author: Pavitraa Parthasarathy

quote: Kind words are sweet to the soul.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Pearls of  Wisdom: Great  mind
category: goodness, healing, hope, inspiration, positive, power-of-words, self-motivation, soul, thoughts, wise-sayings

quote: I used to have this toy, a magic slate. You wrote or drew on it and then, just by pulling up the plastic cover, everything you did disappeared and you could start new. Maybe everyone feels that on New Year's Eve: They can pull up the magic sheet and rewrite their lives.
author: V.C. Andrews
category: 2, landry, life, lives, new-year, pearl-in-the-mist, rewrite, rewritten, thoughts, v-c-andrews

quote: Positive results will come when you start to replace your negative thoughts and habits with positive ones.
author: Robert Tew

quote: The joy is in remembering
author: the pain is in knowing it was yesterday.

quote: ...I day dream.Therefore,I am the queen,of my thoughts.Though thirteen,I drift,between,one conception,to another.I create opinions,liberate dilemmas,assert convictions,deal paroxysm,create perfections.”I am neither,a thinker,nor a,perceiver,I am a Day Dreamer...
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber, Ginger and Honey: An unusual free verse poetry collection
category: dilemmas, dreamers, dreamers-versus-reasoners, dreams, inspirational, opinions, thinkers, thoughts, woman, woman-s-strength

quote: Yes, I am a prisoner of sorts, but my prison isn't the house. It's my own thoughts that lock me up!
author: V.C. Andrews, Pearl in the Mist
category: 2, intrusive-thoughts, landry, locked-up, pearl-in-the-mist, prisoner, thoughts, v-c-andrews

quote: Prot: I'm not tired.Brewer: I am.Prot: Perhaps you're getting too much sleep. All your beings seem to sleep a lot. Is that because it's so awful to be awake?
author: Gene Brewer, K-Pax Redux: A Play, Screenplay, and a Report

quote: People who always arrive early aren't worth waiting for.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2
category: arrival, corporate-culture, facts, generalizations, humorous, lacking-confidence, people, quotes, random, self-esteem, statement, theory, thoughts, waiting, work

quote: It's my fault but the most violating thing I've felt this year is not the media exaggerations or the catchy gossip, but the rape of my personal thoughts.
author: Kurt Cobain, Journals

quote: They might be kind, I thought. They might be sensible and good. They will not be like you.  But I did not say it. I knew it would mean nothing to her. I said something - something ordinary and mild, I cannot think what. And after a time she came and kissed my cheek, and then she left me.
author: Sarah Waters, Affinity
category: feelings, good, hidden, hidden-feelings, kind, love, sensible, thoughts, unrequited-love

quote: Thoughts can follow you anywhere.
author: David Levithan, The Realm of Possibility

quote: I want to take a trip to Shakespeare's brain and vacation there with his thoughts may be I also start writing about twisted love and betrayals.
author: Megha Khare, Write like no one is reading 2
category: brain, shakespeare, thoughts, twisted, vacation, writing

quote: If you sincerely love yourself then you will take 100% full responsibility for your thoughts and actions.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: There are tree main bulwarks of defence against new thoughts: to pay no heed, to give no credence, and finally to assert that it had already long existed.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer, On The Will In Nature

quote: I’m a Texas girl, with a California soul.
author: Crystal Woods, Write like no one is reading 2
category: california, free-soul, free-spirit, girl, good-energy, good-vibes, hippie, quotes, soul, texas, texas-girl, thoughts, writers, writing

quote: Malibu: With sounds of waves crashing, and the ocean at the doorstep, you feel like you are hours away from civilization. And with L.A. traffic, YOU ARE.
author: Jennifer Harrison, Write like no one is reading 2
category: civilization, crashing, doorstep, feelings, la, los-angeles, malibu, ocean, socal, summer, thoughts, water, waves

quote: Happiness can be just one thought away.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Fond memories are some of the richest possessions you can have. They never wear away no matter how often you reuse them !
author: Rj Barber

quote: Happiness can be as close as your next thought.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: What separates courage from fear are the thoughts we choose to believe.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: What separates courage from fear our the thoughts we choose to believe.
author: Charles F. Glassman, Brain Drain   The Breakthrough That Will Change Your Life

quote: Few minds are spacious; few even have an empty place in them or can offer some vacant point. Almost all have narrow capacities and are filled by some knowledge that blocks them up. What a torture to talk to filled heads, that allow nothing from the outside to enter them! A good mind, in order to enjoy itself and allow itself to enjoy others, always keeps itself larger than its own thoughts. And in order to do this, these thoughts must be given a pliant form, must be easily folded and unfolded, so that they are capable, finally, of maintaining a natural flexibility.All those short-sighted minds see clearly within their little ideas and see nothing in those of others; they are like those bad eyes that see from close range what is obscure and cannot perceive what is clear from afar. Night minds, minds of darkness.
author: Joseph Joubert, The Notebooks of Joseph Joubert

quote: The best plans are always the simplest.
author: Jasper Fforde, Shades of Grey

quote: You have the ability to control your thoughts.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!
category: mind-power, mindfulness, mindfulness-practice, negative-attitude, positive-mindset, positive-thinking-quotes, positive-thought, thoughts, thoughts-of-the-mind, wise-quotes, wise-sayings, word

quote: You are mad to be spending the summer in the country, where the days are too quiet and you have so much time to think. In the city you live on Broadway, where the noise is so thick your scary thoughts can't get a word in edgewise. But here in the county, there is only space. On the stone bridge by the stream. On the mossy rock at the edge of the yard. Behind the abandoned trailer where Art, the old man with the glass eye, used to live. Space, space, space, and you can scare yourself into thinking your thoughts are more like voices.
author: Lena Dunham, Not That Kind of Girl: A Young Woman Tells You What She's "Learned"
category: city, country, noise, quiet, space, thoughts

quote: Life is a series of events and sensations. Everything else is interpretation. Much is lost in transition - and added in assumption / projection
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
category: assumptions, concepts, feelings, freedom, ideas, interpretation, life, life-story, mindset, myths, non-duality, projections, quotes-about-life, quotes-on-mindfulness, rasheed-ogunlaru, rasheed-ogunlaru-quotes, sensations, thinking, thoughts

quote: When someone is searching, said Siddhartha, then it might easily happen that the only thing his eyes still see is that what he searches for, that he is unable to find anything, to let anything enter his mind, because he always thinks of nothing but the object of his search, because he has a goal, because he is obsessed by the goal. Searching means: having a goal. But finding means: being free, being open, having no goal. You, oh venerable one, are perhaps indeed a searcher, because, striving for your goal, there are many things you don't see, which are directly in front of your eyes.
author: Hermann Hesse, Siddhartha

quote: Vasudeva listened with great attention. Listening carefully, he leteverything enter his mind, birthplace and childhood, all that learning,all that searching, all joy, all distress. This was among theferryman's virtues one of the greatest: like only a few, he knew howto listen. Without him having spoken a word, the speaker sensed howVasudeva let his words enter his mind, quiet, open, waiting, how hedid not lose a single one, awaited not a single one with impatience,did not add his praise or rebuke, was just listening. Siddhartha felt,what a happy fortune it is, to confess to such a listener, to burry inhis heart his own life, his own search, his own suffering.
author: Hermann Hesse, Siddhartha

quote: He sat down and collected his thoughts. They were quite easy to collect, because there weren't very many of them, and they all concerned the same subject--what a burden his life was.
author: Philip Pullman, Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm: A New English Version

quote: The world, my friend Govinda, is not imperfect, or on a slow path towards perfection: no, it is perfect in every moment, all sin already carries the divine forgiveness in itself, all small children already have the old person in themselves, all infants already have death, all dying people the eternal life.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: When someone is searching, said Siddhartha, then it might easilyhappen that the only thing his eyes still see is that what he searchesfor, that he is unable to find anything, to let anything enter his mind,because he always thinks of nothing but the object of his search,because he has a goal, because he is obsessed by the goal. Searchingmeans: having a goal. But finding means: being free, being open, havingno goal. You, oh venerable one, are perhaps indeed a searcher, because,striving for your goal, there are many things you don't see, which aredirectly in front of your eyes.

quote: I've been alone with my thoughts for too long
author: I'm starting to feel unreal.

quote: EGO means attachment to layers of our unexamined thoughts and illusions.We avoid self inquiry because it shatters our belief system and false image.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: We have All our own Way and Thoughts about Life, please wake up
author: Jan Jansen

quote: But always when I was without a book, my soul would at once become disturbed, and my thoughts wandered. As I read, I began to call them together again and, as it were, laid a bait for my soul
author: Teresa of Ávila, The Life of Saint Teresa of Ávila by Herself

quote: I am suspended in the moment. Flickering images faded with age, frozen thoughts hovering precariously in dead space, a whirlwind of memories that slice through my soul.
author: Tahereh Mafi, Shatter Me
category: chaos, complicated, faded, fading, frozen, memories, mixed-up, storms, suspended-confused, thoughts

quote: I talked a lot in my car. Thousands of words and songs and swears are absorbed in its fabric, just like the orange juice I spilled on my way to the dentist. It knows what happened, when Allie went to Puerto Rico, understands the difference between the way I look at Nick and the way I look at Adam, and remembers the first time I experimented with talking to myself.
author: Marina Keegan

quote: Night-time. Why is it, I wonder… Always, always it is at night whenThe fury of a hurricane makes itself felt. Perhaps it is because the spirit of the storm Delights in the darkness, for there it can Unleash its rage most potently, most Anonymously, upon the element of earth? Or perhaps it is simply because we Humans are afraid of the dark.
author: Stephanie Osborn, Stolen Moments

quote: Your character is a reflection of your thoughts.
author: Unarine Ramaru

quote: Watch your thoughts, for they will become the words of people you draw to yourself.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: healthy-mind, love-yourself, mental-health, mindfulness, relationships, self-love, thinking, thoughts

quote: Benj had once said, "A man must have a care to what he puts in his mind, for when he's alone on a hillside and draws it out he'll want treasures to be his company, not regrets.
author: Elizabeth Yates, Mountain Born

quote: There are all kinds of things we have to deal with in life,' Eri finally said. 'And one thing always seems to connect with another. You try to solve one problem, only to find that another one you hadn't anticipated arises instead. It's not that easy to get free of them. That's true for you - and for me, too.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: you can never say you did something truly right because for every action there is an opposite reaction
author: bikash singh

quote: life is always about compromises
author: bikash singh

quote: Our vibration depends upon what we are thinking, feeling and acting. You have two choices, one is to flow with the chaotic frequencies of the world and feel hopeless, or decide what and how you want to feel.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: A black cat crossing the road is considered bad luck in some cultures. What about the cat’s culture?
author: Anno Nomius, Thoughts from a naked unshackled mind

quote: Too many of us live with an uncontrolled thought life. It is possible to learn to identify destructive thoughts and make wiser choices. Instead of letting those thoughts rumble freely about in my mind, I make the choice to harness them and direct them toward truth.
author: Lysa TerKeurst, Becoming More Than a Good Bible Study Girl

quote: if i had forever to do whatever i wanted, i would spend three years in reality and spend the rest of my time just thinking and decrypting what i saw and what would have happened to make it like so.
author: Angel Death

quote: Do I haste to live? Definitely, no. I endeavour to surpass tomorrow's me.
author: Alexander Zalan, Inspiration Per Moment

quote: Sometimes I want to impersonate a fountain, but specific circumstances don't allow me to do it.
author: Alexander Zalan

quote: And when it's quiet,you can hear your thoughts.You try to escape,but you don't realize,that you are trapped,trapped within your thoughts.
author: Keysi Baker

quote: Communication...it is a difficult optimisation. Structurally, it gets founded over words, organised around thoughts. Words are difficult to come through, successfully, amid the thought process. The thought process in right manifestation gives rise to communication.
author: Priyavrat Thareja

quote: You noticed things. You're not sure when you start. It's only when you've noticed - noticed that you know you've noticed. Maybe between the first time when you're staring to think, Is this what I think it is? and the second time when you think, Yes, between those two times, there's a silence. A pause.
author: Jackie Kay, Wish I Was Here

quote: We can heal our superficial wounds, but how do we kill the pain inside? How can we heal something which no one except us can feel? There is no doctor, no medicine, and no remedy for something like that. People die from sadness almost every day. How can someone be saved from drowning in a whirlpool of their own thoughts?
author: Bhavya Kaushik, The Infinite Equinox

quote: Your thoughts can change your actions and your actions can change your thoughts.
author: Sukant Ratnakar
category: actions, attitude, feelings, happiness, innovation, persistence, smile, success, thoughts

quote: I learnt to test the size of my brain..by trying this simple thought ! Look out for the good things, not the faults.It takes a good deal bigger sized brain to find out what is not wrong with people and things than to fins out what is wrong!!!
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee

quote: The more you make your thoughts and beliefs into your identity, the more cut off you are from the spiritual dimension within yourself.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: If your thoughts can change your actions, then your actions can change your thoughts.
author: Sukant Ratnakar
category: actions, beautiful, happiness, innovation, life, success, thoughts

quote: To think well of all, to be cheerful with all, to patiently learn to find the good in all - such unselfish thoughts are the very portals of heaven; and to dwell day by day in thoughts of peace toward every creature will bring abounding peace to their possessor.
author: James Allen

quote: Life cannot purely rely on thoughts. Action is required with better sence of humour.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: All your THOUGHTS, are either an 'investment' to your well-being or a 'cost' to your well- being! Are your investments growing or the costs are too high..Think about it !
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee, Nucleus: Power Women: Lead from the Core

quote: See, my aim is not to survive but to be thrown to the wolfs with adrenaline still pumping in my veins and hear the gods laughing saying ”that was one hell of a youth” and everything I do I do in order to push my senses and levels of natural ecstasy. I want to be so awake that I pass out by exhaustion every night with a smile on my face and no thoughts of tomorrow because today was all I ever could make of it and I am sick and tired of boredom. Bored people slumbering boring words about bored habits and I want to get out.
author: Charlotte Eriksson
category: adrenaline, bored, boredom, carpe-diem, ecstasy, face, get-out, gods, habits, laughing, living-life-to-the-fullest, natural, survive, thoughts, today, tomorrow, veins, wolfs, youth

quote: Countless people live their whole lives without ever knowing this...this unnameable thing that we share. This exclusive and secret club that we are so blessed to be a part of. I suppose that by many people's definition, it would simply be called 'Love'. And yet, this is unlike any other love or feeling or emotion that I have ever felt. Simply calling it 'Love' would be an injustice...it would do a massive disservice to this feeling that seems to envelop me with every breath I take. It's as if wherever I go, it goes; and whichever direction I look, it sees. It moves with me as if we've been doing this dance forever...like we are one being and of one mind. It has to uncanny ability to affect change by just existing; it speaks to me and with me and through me and every time it says my name, it cloaks my entire being with a warm comforting familiar glow...like it's only ever meant to be said that way and no different. It's not just simply love...it's everything.
author: Charles R. Mackriel
category: dance, emotion, feeling, happiness, life, love, love-story, soulmate, thoughts

quote: Our inner experience is that which we think, feel, remember, perceive, sense, decide, plan and predict. These experiences are actually mental actions, or mental activity (Van der Hart et al., 2006). Mental activity, in which we engage all the time, may or may not be accompanied by behavioral actions. It is essential that you become aware of, learn to tolerate and regulate, and even change major mental actions that affect your current life, such as negative beliefs, and feelings or reactions to the past the interfere with the present. However, it is impossible to change inner experiences if you are avoiding them because you are afraid, ashamed or disgusted by them. Serious avoidance of you inner experiences is called experiential avoidance (Hayes, Wilson, Gifford, & Follettte, 1996), or the phobia of inner experience (Steele, Van der Hart, & Nijenhuis, 2005; Van der Hart et al., 2006).
author: Suzette Boon, Coping with Trauma-Related Dissociation: Skills Training for Patients and Therapists
category: avoidance, disgust, dissociative-identity-disorder, fear, feelings, mental-disorder, phobia, ptsd, self-awareness, shame, survivors, thoughts, trauma

quote: ...he is thinking about thoughts; so many thoughts piled up, such a quantity of half-remembered knowledge, so many emotions brought up from the well to spill out: the unrolling of history - a river into which you can't step twice, a collection of biographies end to end, a hilltop to survey the surrounding plains and so on - but also, more so, the anxieties prompted by the spooling of time and the awareness of its unstoppable nature; and random thoughts...
author: Justin Cartwright

quote: it's a fine moon', she repeated
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The ink in your pen never reshapes your thoughts, you must replace the ink before the ink can be inked properly.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: brain, change, changes, ink, notebook, pen, replace, representation, reshape, thinking, thoughts, writing, you

quote: They said “globalization”!!; my reply then was and still is that the only way for "globalization" to cherish and succeed is through a “lifestyle” and not through a “culture” driven societies; and gentlemen, that is not what the world can afford !!
author: Hisham Fawzi

quote: [I]f he had to guess, he would say that the reason he doesn't want to loan the book out, to Ethan or anyone else, is because of the part of his personality that is one gigantic record-keeping system, a complex sifting and filing scheme that dictates what goes here and what goes there, turning his life into so many marks on a tablet. His mind would busy itself with the book's whereabouts every second it was away. He knows it would.
author: Kevin Brockmeier, A Few Seconds of Radiant Filmstrip: A Memoir of Seventh Grade
category: brains, filing, loans, ocd, personality, record-keeping, thoughts

quote: What you see, say, think, and believe about yourself affects your feelings, decisions, and actions.
author: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Basic understanding of who were are is through Self Awareness. By understanding our thoughts we can dive deeper into them and get a better understanding of who we are in the process.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: I'm thinking about the cat dying, Dulcie and her knife against my throat, Mrs Irvin and her St Thomas bone... But never my sister. A brother rarely thinks about his sister.
author: Louis Nowra, Summer Of The Aliens

quote: Keep your thoughts clean. the life we are living soon be past.
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: In a valley betwixt two hills there I stood perfectly still. In this stance I did find the most beautiful secrets of my mind
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich, Stantasyland: Quips Quotes and Quandaries

quote: When you change your perspective towards this world, you can find happiness everywhere.
author: Saga Valsalan

quote: Love always flows. When we hinder it's path, it gets flooded, destroys everything around it.
author: Saga Valsalan

quote: Ideas and opinions are not spontaneously "born" in each individual brain: they have had a centre of formation, or irradiation, of dissemination, of persuasion-a group of men, or a single individual even, which has developed them and presented them in the political form of current reality.
author: Antonio Gramsci, Selections from the Prison Notebooks

quote: I have to get out of this room as soon as possible, or my own thoughts will wage war against me.
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: I happen to know this, and I happen to know that, and maybe I know that;and I work everything out from there. Tomorrow I may forgot that this is true, but remember that something else is true, so I can reconstruct it all again. I am never quite sure of where I am supposed to begin or where I am supposed to end. I just remember enough all the time so that as the memory fades and some of the pieces fall out I can put the thing back together again every day
author: Richard Feynman, The Character of Physical Law

quote: Thoughts have creative energy exhilaration is required to creates dissolves and recreates.
author: Kishore Bansal
category: creative, dissolve, energy, exhilaration, required, thoughts

quote: Humanity reaches to its full development with beauty of thoughts and deeds
author: Kishore Bansal

quote: There's a war between two wolves inside everybody. One is anger, jealousy, greed, resentment, inferiority, lies and ego. The other's good. It's love, peace, beauty, happiness, truth, hope, joy, humility, kindness, and empathy. "Who wins...?""The one you feed".
author: MK Asante

quote: Reasoning is the mental tool that use to think with
author: Bob Proctor

quote: I happen to know this, and I happen to know that, and maybe I know that;and I work everything out from there. Tomorrow I may forgot that this is true, but remember that something else is true, so I can reconstruct it all again. I am never quite sure of where I am supposed to begin or where I am supposed to end. I just remember enough all the time so that as the memory fades and some of the pieces fall out I can put the thing back together again every day.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: I sit back up and try to banish such thoughts from my mind. They're stickier than I expect.
author: DelSheree Gladden, Intangible

quote: I think they're being cheap with their lives, that's why. So they seem ravenous for the worst thoughts I can have.

quote: In one sense, reading is a great waste of time. In another sense, it is a great extension of time, a way for one person to live a thousand and one lives in a single lifespan, to watch the great impersonal universe at work again and again,
author: Mary Ruefle, Madness, Rack, and Honey: Collected Lectures

quote: A healthy mind observes and questions itself. This is the path to inner peace and happiness. Don’t believe everything you think.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: happiness, healthy-mind, inner-peace, mental-health, mindfulness, thinking, thoughts

quote: I stared out at the waves. "Why am I here?" I thought. Finally it came to me. But it was too late. I was a terrible lifeguard.
author: Alex Bosworth

quote: There are few things more destructive than thoughts believed without question.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: If you are not in control of your thoughts then you are not in control of yourself. Without self-control, you have no real power, regardless of whatever else you accomplish. If you are not aware of the thoughts that you are thinking in each moment, then you are the rider with no reins, with no power over where you are going. You cannot control what you are not aware of. Awareness must come first.
author: Thomas M. Sterner, The Practicing Mind: Bringing Discipline and Focus into Your Life
category: awareness, mind-power, mindfulness, self-awareness, self-control, thoughts

quote: Thoughts are tyrants that return again and again to torment us.
author: Emily Brontë, Wuthering Heights

quote: TOMORROW’S WILLSilent world, I find myself,Glad no one hears my thoughts.In dark cocoon, I hibernate,Yet spirit spills every thought.A second chance to try again.The risks I know too well.Two sunsets turning into six-Awaits tomorrow's will.
author: Giorge Leedy, Uninhibited From Lust To Love
category: cocoon, hibernate, poem, poetry, risks, silent, spirit, sunsets, thoughts, tomorrow-s, tomorrows, will, world

quote: People, material and situation come in to our lives because of our thoughts and beliefs. When we don’t want those experiences, we try to push them away. When we use our vital energy in resisting what we don’t want, we attract more of it whether it’s a person, circumstance or challenge.
author: Hina Hashmi, Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: Cleanliness beings with purity of your own mind, thoughts and heart.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: I remember reading once that some fellows use language to conceal thought
author: but it's been my experience that a good many more use it instead of thought.
category: George Horace Lorimer, Letters from a Self-Made Merchant to His Son

quote: You build your reality from the desires and thoughts that you focused upon.
author: Steven Redhead, Unleash The Power of Your Heart and Mind

quote: More often than not, it's better to give up thinking, worrying and obsessing, in favour of faith that things will work out fine.

quote: Being afraid of things going wrong, doesn't help them go right.

quote: Remember, the thoughts that you think and the statements you make regarding yourself determine your mental attitude. If you have a worthwhile objective, find the one reason why you can achieve it rather than hundreds of reasons why you can’t.

category: achieve, attitude, determine, hundreds, mental, mental-attitude, objective, reason, reasons, remember, statements, thoughts, worthwhile, yourself

quote: A real friend is one who helps us to think our best thoughts, do our noblest deeds, and be our finest selves.
author: Elizabeth George
category: best, blessed, christian, deed, faith, finest, friend, god, help, noble, real, self, think, thoughts

quote: Our minds, unedited by guilt or shame, are not for public consumption, because they would either be hurtful or else just make us look like the selfish and unkind bastards we are. We don't share thoughts, we share carefully sanitized, watered-down versions of them.

quote: My thoughts are stars I can't fanthom into constellations.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Remember You Attract What You Think, Keep Your Thoughts Focus On What You Want and You’ll Be Amazed..
author: Jovan Savage
category: attract, attraction, think, thinking, thought, thoughts, universe

quote: Befriend simple thoughts for tangled ones may choke you
author: Bela Anĝelo

quote: He of all people knew how negative thinking could sabotage things.

quote: The thoughts of Man build future worlds, whilst the emotions of the Fey build up this, our Natural World.
author: Gabriel Brunsdon, Azlander: Second Nature

quote: Dream is a screen where uncensored frames get played
author: Saga Valsalan

quote: Thoughts alone are potent writs of becoming.

quote: For one must label a thought with language for one can understand the meaning of the thinking mind.
author: Nynke Visser
category: change, inspiritational, language, new-age, philosophy, thinking, thoughts

quote: Whats on my mind? I think the question is, where is my mind?

quote: He was alone with his thoughts. They were extremely unpleasant thoughts and he would rather have had a chaperon.

quote: Each positive thought is your refuge and your sanctuary, where in that thoughtful moment, you are safe.

quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.

quote: Conflicts stay in your mind with your permission.You allow them to.

quote: The more one has engaged in a particular pattern of thought, the more difficult it becomes to override these habitual patterns.

quote: The beautiful world is just one thought away. It's already there just waiting for us to realize and to accept it.

quote: Something is reflecting our thoughts back to us in obvious and not so obvious ways.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Life is simply a collective thought. Didn't you know we made it all up? Don't you know it can be different?
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: Consider the road, long and forkedas the Devil’s own tongue.Consider the Devil, burningevery bridge; Placingin every tree a black bird. 	In every bird a black thought.

quote: We talk what we think but do what we believe.

quote: Every good thing begins with one positive thought.

quote: In a sea of trouble your thoughts are your lifeboat.

quote: Pray for your own deliverance from your own vicious thoughts.

quote: There is no such thing as perfection and it is okay for you to have negative thoughts.

quote: One positive thought is something you can accomplish.

quote: One positive thought will shift the entire world under your feet.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: To alter the universe, alter your thoughts, because the only universe you will ever know is in your mind.
author: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: i swear to God, that was the question. Sometimes, I think there's someone up there just sitting around thinking of ways to make me look like a complete moron. Seriously, I bet there's an angel or more likely a demon assigned just to me. And every day it gets up and asks itself what it can do to ruin my life. well, today it got an A plus
author: Michael Thomas Ford, Suicide Notes
category: bad-luck, complaining, complicated, life, thoughts, upset

quote: The whiskey was a good start. I got the idea from Dylan Thomas. He's this poet who drank twenty-one straight whiskeys at the White Horse Tavern in New York and then died on the spot from alcohol poisoning. I've always wanted to hear the bartender's side of the story. What was it like watching this guy drink himself out of here? How did it feel handing him number twenty-one and watching his face crumple up before the fall of the stool? And did he already have number twenty-two poured, waiting for this big fat tip, and then have to drink it himself after whoever came took the body away?
author: Michael Thomas Ford, Suicide Notes
category: alcohol, alcohol-addiction, alcoholism, bar, bartender, death, drinking, dylan-thomas, new-york, sad, suicidal-thoughts, suicide, thoughts, tips, tragedy, tragic, whiskey, wine

quote: Your every ill-thought, secreted hate, cynical and vicious judgment you carry is meant only for you.

quote: Are you in love? What makes your heart beat faster? What do you want people to think about when they hear your name.

quote: I grabbed a shovel and dug, and dug, and dug.Sorry not a very poetic thought, but very deep.

quote: Another person's thoughts about you are outside of your jurisdiction
author: you have no authority.
category: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

quote: I wasn’t too late. I got there in time. I didn’t lose her.
author: Melyssa Winchester, Take Me with You

author: Deeksha Mittal

quote: All make mistakes but the important thing then should be, Learn from them and do not repeat them subsequently.[230]	- 4 (Thoughts)
author: Munindra Misra, Eddies of Life

quote: ... A nightmare is something you awaken from, Peter," she had said. "But thoughts and ideas that remain after its terrors have disappeared are something considerably worse.

quote: Instead of spending your dear energy on hating enemies, Utilize this energy to love your friends a little harder truly.[229]	- 4 (Thoughts)
author: Munindra Misra, Eddies of Life
category: energy, hate, life, love, thoughts, time

quote: Oh, Confucius, "real knowledge" is to know we will ever be able to measure the extent of our, or one's, ignorance.
author: Lúcia Ramos

quote: But morning casts a harsh light over things, and the stark reality is that some things are easier to walk away from than to lose forever. But that doesn’t mean that this doesn’t hurt.
author: andyoureturntome

quote: Our consistent thoughts become the things in our lives.
author: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Egde: The Class They Don't Teach You in School

quote: Life as a mountain – so rugged and hard to climb definitely, But once you get to the top the view is beautiful indisputably.[225]	- 4 (Thoughts)
author: Munindra Misra, Eddies of Life

quote: If someone left, mean not your happiness gone surely, Happiness dependant not on others but yourself but be.[223]	- 4 (Thoughts)
author: Munindra Misra, Eddies of Life

quote: Silence - best answer for all the questions does certainly be, Your smile - best reaction to all the life’s situations positively.[228]	- 4 (Thoughts)
author: Munindra Misra, Eddies of Life

quote: Because women never say what they think.
author: Cassandra Clare, Clockwork Prince
category: shadowhunters, tdi, tessa-gray, the-infernal-devices, thoughts, will-herondale, women

quote: Whenever you go out-of-doors, draw the chin in, carry the crown of the head high, and fill the lungs to the utmost; drink in the sunshine; greet your friends with a smile, and put soul into every handclasp. Do not fear being misunderstood and do not waste a minute thinking about your enemies. Try to fix firmly in your mind what you would like to do; and then, without veering off direction, you will move straight to the goal. Keep your mind on the great and splendid things you would like to do, and then, as the days go gliding away, you will find yourself unconsciously seizing upon the opportunities that are requiered for the fulfillment of your desire, just as the coral insect takes from the running tide the element it needs. Picture in your mind the able, earnest, useful person you desire to be, and the thought you hold is hourly transforming you into that particular individual... Thought is supreme. Preserve a right mental attitude - the attitude of courage, frankness, and good cheer. To think rightly is to create. All things come through desire and every sincere prayer is answered. We become like that on which our hearts are fixed. Carry your chin in and the crown of your head high. We are good in the chrysalis.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Great and pure thoughts cannot be deposited in minds accumulated with rubbish.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: authority, bad, bad-leaders, bad-people, destruction, dominance, follower, followers, gibberish, great-thoughts, kingdom, lead, leader, love, michael-bassey-johnson, path, podeposition, purity, redirection, reflectihip, rubbish, rule, thought, thoughts, true-leader, true-love, virtue, vision

quote: Great ideas emerges from useless fragments of thoughts.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: contemplation, fragments, great, great-man, idea, inspirational-quote, little-things, michael-bassey-johnson, muse, musing, musings, reflection, retrospection, talent, thinking, thoughts, useless, wisdom

quote: One not only wants to be understood when one writes, but also quite as certainly not to be understood. It is by no means an objection to a book when someone finds it unintelligible: perhaps this might just have been the intention of its author, perhaps he did not want to be understood by "anyone”. A distinguished intellect and taste, when it wants to communicate its thoughts, always selects its hearers; by selecting them, it at the same time closes its barriers against "the others". It is there that all the more refined laws of style have their origin: they at the same time keep off, they create distance, they prevent "access" (intelligibility, as we have said,) while they open the ears of those who are acoustically related to them.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche, The Gay Science
category: esoteric, intellect, nietzsche, reader, taste, thoughts

quote: Iron can only be destroyed by rust, and rust is a slow process which is caused by the hydrogen ion from water in the environment. Coat yourself against negative thoughts and be careful what you feed your mind because your mind is your greatest asset, make sure you are not using it against yourself.﻿
author: Uzoma Nnadi

quote: I'm simply saying that our deepest thoughts, desires and preoccupations manifest themselves in art, whether we intend them to or not. That's what art is for; it's not cerebral, it's emotional.
author: Simon Pegg, Nerd Do Well
category: art, cerebral, desires, emotions, nerd-do-well, preoccupations, simon-pegg, thoughts

quote: All the morning since he got up he had been trying to fight through his duties—leaning against a hope—a hope that first had bowed, and then had broke as soon as he really tried its weight. There was not a sign of Sylvia’s liking for him to be gathered from the most careful recollection of the past evening. It was of no use thinking there was. It was better to give it up altogether and at once. But what if he could not? What if the thought of her was bound up with his life; and that once torn out by his own free will, the very roots of his heart must come also?
author: Elizabeth Gaskell, Sylvia's Lovers
category: heart, love, philip, sylvia, thoughts, unreq

quote: UNDAUNTED PURSUITSuccess, however measured, is the seat of a stool with three legs of determination, focus and resilience
author: Kamil Ali, Profound Vers-A-Tales
category: ali, dawn, dawn-s, determination, focus, kamil, kamiltheauthor, philosophy, pursuit, resilience, spawn, success, thoughts

quote: We may always enslave ourselves to mankind if we do not clearly differentiate between showing respect to mankind from pleasing mankind
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?
category: brainy-quote, inspirational, purpose, respect, responsibility, thoughts

quote: I LOVE YOUDon't just 'think' it. Say it before it's too late - The burden of regret is a heavy cross to bear
author: Kamil Ali, Profound Vers-A-Tales
category: ali, cross, dawn, dawn-s, kamil, kamiltheauthor, love, philosophy, regret, spawn, thoughts

quote: Looking up at [the sky], I think about the October evening world, where 'people' must be going about their lives. Beneath that pale autumn light, they must be walking down streets, going to the store for things, preparing dinner, boarding trains for home. And they think--if they think at all--that these things are too obvious to think about, just as I used to do (or not do).
author: Haruki Murakami, The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: There is something great in whatever you look at. Many people look but few people see;to leave a distinctive footprint, do not just look but see for seeing will make you different
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah, Distinctive Footprints of Life: Where Are You Heading Towards?

quote: She kissed him… long enough he could almost hear her thoughts. Long enough that he began to know her story, know what she had been through.
author: Thomm Quackenbush, Danse Macabre (Night's Dream, #2)

quote: It was different, though, knowing something in your thoughts and then hearing it confirmed, made real, planted in the world like a tree
author: Guy Gavriel Kay, River of Stars
category: confirmation, knowing, real, something, thoughts, trees, world

quote: Don't take crucial decisions when you are depressed or filled with anger, because then the decision is not made by you.
author: Saga Valsalan

quote: I will be forever grateful to Dora Brooking, for not only spotting my light bulb but also helping me turn up the wattage.
author: Simon Pegg, Nerd Do Well

quote: I suspect that on some level, life is a matter of indefensible loyalties.
author: Mark Slouka, Essays from the Nick of Time: Reflections and Refutations

quote: I feel as if the world is listening for my next thought. But I can't think of anything. Sorry, but I just can't think of anything.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle

quote: You haven't lived a full life until you have been in a very tough situation when you thought you were going to die. War does that to you.
author: William E. Peterson
category: danger, death, life, scared, thoughts, viet-nam, war

quote: Why do I always have so many fucking questions in my head?
author: Jessica Sorensen, Breaking Nova

quote: your thoughts will make you a victor or a victim.
author: Rob Liano
category: abuse, accountability, attitude, growth, knowledge, maturity, self-help, thoughts, victom, victor, victory, wisdom

quote: Syllogism ―Major premise: I can control my thoughts.Minor premise: My feelings come from my thoughts.Conclusion: I can control my feelings.
author: Wayne W. Dyer, Your Erroneous Zones

quote: She's not like other girls because she's different. I want her kind of different.
author: Melyssa Winchester, Count on Me

quote: Then he laughed, and the sound was a comfort to her, and she fought against the and silver lights that shown in his eyes, and lost. When he spoke his voice was soft."And now I'm wondering," he said, "how it is you don't realize your eyes ensnare me, just as mine do you. I can't explain it, Kate's, but you shouldn't let it embarrass you. For we're both overtaken by the same--foolishness.
author: Kristin Chashore
category: attraction, eyes, graceling, katsa, po, thoughts

quote: I believe that. All divorce does is divert you, taking you away from everything you thought you knew and everything you thought u wanted and steering you into all kinds of other stuff, like discussions about your mother's girdle and whether she should marry someone else.
author: Mitch Albom, For One More Day
category: divert, divorce, kids, marriage, mother, pain, plain-truth, thoughts

quote: The shark had never begged Jonah in order to get him swallowed; Jonah's own actions took him into the shark's belly! Failure may not chase after you, but when you miss your way, you will rather go chasing failure!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, The Great Hand Book of Quotes
category: actions, bible, bible-verse, ccf, fail, failed, failing, failure, jonah, shark, shark-s-belly, thoughts

quote: Just because all your friends are doing it, doesn't mean you have to follow suit. Don't be a blind follower, you don't know where you're going.
author: Lik Hock Yap
category: blind, choice, friendship, inspirational, lost, thoughts, trend, wise

quote: What weeping adds quietly to your life. Happiness can't even have idea of it.
author: Lovely Goyal, I Love the Way You Love Me

quote: The evil that is in Man comes of sluggish minds...for sluggards cannot think, and will not...Send upon us thy flames that we may be burnt of dead thoughts, even as we burn dead grass...make us see.
author: Richard Llewellyn, How Green Was My Valley

quote: Don't want to think about it? No problem. Don't think about it.
author: Bee Ridgway, The River of No Return

quote: Universe is nothing, but human thought.
author: Farid Huseynli

quote: Only the power of light illuminates our thoughts and our being.
author: Kristian Goldmund Aumann, From Poet's Hand

quote: Thoughts are free, talk is cheap, and action is expensive. What's your worth?
author: Noel DeJesus
category: action, ambition, free, leadership, life, life-lesson, motivation, self-worth, success, thoughts

quote: Life is always uncertain. No one knows what's in there. But now my life is everywhere, I would just like to breathe and sleep and get all the rest I could. I wake up five in the morning some days just thinking about my own thoughts and stare blankly in thin air. Not sure what I am looking at but I know for a fact I am in my own world. Those times I am just inside my head just thinking about what is ahead.
author: Happy Positivity Blankly Ahead
category: air, blankly-ahead, confuse, confused-mind, deep, deep-thought, happy-positivity, happy-positivity-quotes, insertion-point, inspiration, life, mystery, own-world, quotes, thinking, thoughts, uncertain, uncertainty, wisdom

quote: Poetry?"..."No, just thoughts, glimpses, things running through my head.
author: Mary E. Pearson

quote: Never are we as honest as at night, alone with thoughts and nightmares.
author: Laura Lam, Shadowplay

quote: A destructive thought process exists within all of us, and we are plagued to varying degrees by an internal dialogue that is harmful, restrictive, and at its ultimate extreme, self-destructive.
author: Lisa Firestone

quote: The crisis is past and all is well, the sheep returns to the fold. We're all sheep who have strayed at times. Truth is truth, to the end of reckoning, we've cried. They are never alone that are accompanied with noble thoughts, we've shouted to ourselves.
author: Ray Bradbury, Fahrenheit 451

quote: It's easier to ignore all the bad shit in the light. Distract yourself with work and TV and other people. The dark is just... bad memories. Bad dreams. I don't like to be left alone with all that.
author: Ruthie Knox, How to Misbehave

quote: Fear is an abortion of good thoughts
author: Nomthandazo Tsembeni

quote: Always try to be perceptive and observant in living, sensatory for details and diversity. Always try to see beyond the surface, and look in another perspective. Always try not to judge. Always seeks new experience, embrace and took chances. To live life maximally and develop into a better person.
author: Nin

quote: The most significant way you can edify another person is to see them accurately as the same as you, listen to them, and honor their right to their own thoughts and feelings.
author: Kimberly Giles, Choosing Clarity: The Path to Fearlessness

quote: Sometimes. it is not the person that you miss, but the memories that you made.
author: S.M.T.

quote: A robin perched on the branch of the apple tree, his feathers ruffled, his red chest blazing.'No need to look so down in the mouth,' he chirruped. 'Things'll get worse before they get better.''I don't know what it is about that tree,' Geno grumbled, 'that makes everything that sits in it talk in proverbs.''It's easier than thinking,' the robin stated.
author: Felix Salten, Bambi's Children

quote: If our thoughts can change our actions, reverse is also possible. Our Actions can Change Our Thoughts!
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open The Windows: To the World around You

quote: It will, It had, It is happening, depending on how you think and react about it.
author: Savan Solanki

quote: Enriched vocabularies someone had (and used) are produced by a boundless wondrous mind. Sometime with a non mediocre experience also.
author: Nin

quote: Men fear thought as they fear nothing else on earth -- more than ruin, more even than death.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Life isn't about just talking, it's about thinking too.
author: Marie Symeou
category: introverts, life, think-before-you-speak, thinkers, thinking, thoughts

quote: Have you ever had so many thoughts churning inside that you didn't dare let them escape, in case they blew you wide open?
author: Ellen Hopkins, Crank

quote: Not much goes on in the mind of a squirrel.Huge portions of what is loosely termed "the squirrel brain" are given over to one thought:
author: Kate DiCamillo, Flora and Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures
category: animals, brains, food, rodents, squirrels, thinking, thoughts

quote: Not every thought needs to be voiced
author: Hyrum A Yeakley

quote: Music gives inspiration...one that sounds windy with humming sound, such can put you in a trance, only to come back and discover some witty ideas.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: celestial, heavenly-music, humming, idea, inspirational, instrument, michael-bassey-johnson, music, ochestra, poetry, relaxation, sound, thoughts, trance, voilin, wind, wits, witty

quote: When you look at another person, see them as an extension of your thought or feeling. What you two thought or felt THEN, magnetically connected you two NOW.
author: Franklin Gillette

quote: The same way that a tiny thought in our childhood can manifest thirty years later as an anxiety disorder, one tiny thought right now can manifest just six months from now as unconditional love and unshakable happiness.
author: Vironika Tugaleva
category: anxiety, awareness, happiness, thinking, thoughts, unconditional-love

quote: The girl and Doctor Reefy began their courtship on a summer afternoon. He was forty-five then and already he had begun the practice of filling his pockets with the scraps of paper that became hard balls and were thrown away. The habit had been formed as he sat in his buggy behind the jaded white horse and went slowly along country roads. On the papers were written thoughts, ends of thoughts, beginnings of thoughts.One by one the mind of Doctor Reefy had made the thoughts. Out of many of them he formed a truth that arose gigantic in his mind. The truth clouded the world. It became terrible and then faded away and the little thoughts began again.("Paper Pills")
author: Sherwood Anderson, Short Shorts

quote: I don’t always do what I say but if you want to follow my actions, be my guest. You can do what I do and fail, or you can do what I say and move on with your life. It’s your choice.
author: Nicketa Gomes

quote: Clarity of your thoughts makes your actions precise :-) Whenever you feel your actions are not appropriate, watch out your thoughts... :-)
author: Raj Vanjara

quote: External sources of positive energy and motivation will exhaust, unless we have our captive generation of positive energy.The only sustainable source of positive energy is our thoughts.
author: Sukant Ratnakar, Open The Windows: To the World around You

quote: What appears in your life everyday is the result of what you have previously thought or felt. The speed that your thoughts and feelings appear in your life depends on how much you believe it to be true.
author: Franklin Gillette

quote: My brain is so busy with Nick thoughts, it’s a swarm inside my head: Nicknicknicknicknick! And when I picture his mind, I hear my name as a shy crystal ping that occurs once, maybe twice, a day and quickly subsides. I just wish he thought about me as much as I do him.Is that wrong? I don’t even know anymore.
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl

quote: What was after the universe?Nothing. But was there anything round the universe to show where it stopped before the nothing place began?
author: James Joyce, A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
category: mind-blowing, nothing, nothingness, science, space, thoughts, universe

quote: He looked down at me without recognition, and I realized with a little stab of anxiety that he must have forgotten all about me, perhaps for some considerable time, and that he himself was so lost in the labyrinth of his own unquiet thoughts that I did not exist.
author: Daphne du Maurier, Rebecca

quote: Those 'back burner' thoughts, the ones the brain isn't quite sure about yet, may cook the slowest yet they often manage to be the tastiest when they come out.
author: Criss Jami, Killosophy
category: brain, contemplation, ideas, intellectual, thinking, thoughts

quote: Oblivion is the place where all my best thoughts reside or I must say hide.
author: Shreya Gupta

quote: Poetry is inspired by the elements of random thoughts, an overflow of gazing at the unseen.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson
category: apollo, elements, gaze, god, inspirational, inspire, michael-bassey-johnson, poet, poetic, poetry, random-thoughts, thinking, thoughts, unseen

quote: Our relationship could now thrive only in my head, and to discuss it with a mother intent—admittedly in my own best interest—on challenging it with reality might do it irreparable harm.
author: Mohsin Hamid, The Reluctant Fundamentalist

quote: People say I have created things. I have never created anything. I get impressions from the Universe at large and work them out, but I am only a plate on a record or a receiving apparatus — what you will. Thoughts are really impressions that we get from outside.
author: Larry Dossey, One Mind: How Our Individual Mind Is Part of a Greater Consciousness and Why It Matters

quote: The carved stone sign in front read Building C.Imaginative title, Langdon thought
author: Dan Brown, Angels & Demons
category: building, buildings, carved-stone, stone, thought, thoughts, title, titles

quote: You are the conductor of your own attitude! Nobody else can compose your thoughts for you.
author: Lee J. Colan

quote: The mind complex is that portion of the individual being which reflects (like a mirror) the in-pourings of the spirit and the up-pourings of the light body complex. It is where we experience the thoughts, instincts, feelings, emotions, awareness, etc.
author: Thomas Vazhakunnathu, God Does Not Roll Dice
category: awareness, emotions, feelings, instincts, mind-body-spirit, spirituality, thoughts

quote: Character builds on characters. Very few recognised them as a character, others should look for it until they get one.
author: Vikram Roy

quote: Character builds on characters. Very few can recognised them as a character, others should look for it until they get one.
author: Vikram Roy

quote: Some thoughts are like old piece of belongings that need to be disposed to move on.
author: Richmond Akhigbe
category: belongings, disposed, dragging-along, embracing-the-future, old-piece, past, thoughts

quote: You bothered yourself and changed the season. I was left behind with your awful sounds.
author: Cat Alonso
category: cat-alonso, hurt, life, lifelessons, pain, poetry, poetry-love, poetry-quote, thoughts

quote: It's strange to see people you don't know well in the morning, with sleepy eyes and pillow creases in their cheeks
author: Veronica Roth, Allegiant

quote: It's easy to get lost in our own heads. It's easy to allow the thoughts and worries and plans and hopes to take on their own lives and control our minds in such a way that we lose sight of all that's around us in any given moment. It's difficult to allow those thoughts and problems to take a back seat in our lives in order to be completely aware of what's right here, right now. Perhaps there's a person who really could use you to take a couple of moments to pay attention to him or her; perhaps there's a cool autumn breeze that's going to calm your spirit with its amazing touch--but only if you actually notice it.
author: Tom Walsh
category: attention, awakening, awareness, mindfulness, now, present-moment, slowing-down, thoughts, today

quote: Our every action has consequences. Thoughts have consequences. Since actions start from thoughts I guess I can say technically that thoughts in general have consequences. In our thoughts we make dreams. So if I think I can do it, then my actions will be "I CAN" and I am able to do it. So the result or the consequence will be "I did it!".
author: Diana Rose Morcilla
category: action, advice, art, artist, author, blog, blog-quotes, blogger, book, cause-and-effect, dreams, happiness, happy-positivity, i-can, inspirational, inspirational-quotes-philosophy, karma, law-of-attraction, philosophy, quotes, real, success, the-secret, thoughts, true, wisdom

quote: Il n'est si homme de bien, qu'il mette à l'examen des loix toutes ses actions et pensées, qui ne soit pendable dix fois en sa vie.(There is no man so good that if he placed all his actions and thoughts under the scrutiny of the laws, he would not deserve hanging ten times in his life.)
author: Michel de Montaigne, The Complete Essays
category: actions, goodness, guilt, laws, privacy, thoughts

quote: When we have the same thought again, the line of the original thought is deepened, causing what's called a memory trace. With each repetition the trace goes deeper and deeper, forming and embedding a pattern of thought. When an emotion is tied to this thought pattern, the memory trace grows exponentially stronger.
author: Lysa TerKeurst, Unglued: Making Wise Choices in the Midst of Raw Emotions

quote: But there's a sacredness which is not of thought, nor of a feeling resuscitated by thought. It is not recognizable by thought nor can it be utilized by thought. Thought cannot formulate it. But there's a sacredness, untouched by any symbol or word. It is not communicable. It is a fact.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti, Krishnamurtis Notebook

quote: As I think of myself, so I shall be.
author: Vironika Tugaleva, The Love Mindset: An Unconventional Guide to Healing and Happiness

quote: If someone asked you what color the sky is, what would you say?
author: Shey Stahl

quote: He meticulously tries to get every hair in place. He tilts his head to look at himself from different angles, like there's some magic perspective in the mirror that could change the dimensions of his face'-Olivia/Via thinking
author: R.J. Palacio, Wonder

quote: Culture has little to do with how refined a man's intellect is
author: it rather depends on the refinement of his emotions.

quote: Throughout my childhood I believed that what I thought about was different from what other kids thought about. It was not necessarily more profound, but there was a struggle going on inside me to find some sort of creative or spiritual or aesthetic way of seeing the world and organizing it in my head.
author: Anne Lamott, Bird by Bird: Some Instructions on Writing and Life

quote: When you are wronged and your heart and feelings are hardened, do not be distressed, for this has happened providentially; but be glad and reject the thoughts that arise within you, knowing that if they are destroyed at the stage when they are only provocations, their evil consequences will be cut off, whereas if the thoughts persist the evil may be expected to develop.
author: St. Mark the Ascetic
category: consequences-of-evil, distress, evil, feelings, heart, providence, provocation, thoughts

quote: I am neither a philosopher nor a thinker, but simply follower of my own thoughts.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: The thought is a deed. Of all deeds she fertilizes the world most.
author: Émile Zola

quote: Old Scully, who according to Jennifer, hadn't the imagination to think the worst. Something she said once, as though neurosis was an artform.
author: Tim Winton, The Riders

quote: Whenever we think, we construct a world that is centred upon the object of our thinking; whenever we act, we reconstruct a world that is centred upon ourselves.
author: Raheel Farooq

quote: Sleep is like a cat: It only comes to you if you ignore it. I drank more and continued my mantra. 'Stop thinking', swig, 'empty your head', swig, 'now, seriously empty your head'.
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl
category: alcohol, alcoholic, alone, binging, cat, cats, drinking, empty-your-head, ignorance, ignoring, insomnia, lonely, mantra, murphy-s-law, playing-hard-to-get, self-assurance, sleep, sleeping, stop-thinking, talking-to-yourself, the-mind, thinking, thinking-process, thoughts, voices-inside-your-head

quote: Ever been in a spelling bee as a kid? That snowy second after the announcement of the word as you sift your brain to see if you can spell it? It was like that, the blank panic.
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl
category: anxiety, anxious, blank-mind, brain, forgetting, going-blank, lost-thoughts, panic, panic-attack, spelling-bee, the-human-mind, the-mind, thinking, thoughts

quote: I have walked myself into my best thoughts and I know of no thought so burdensome that one cannot walk away from it.
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: If we could be seen thinking, we would show blown bright one moment, dark the next, like embers; subject to every passing word and thought of our own or other people's, mostly other people's.
author: Dorothy Whipple

quote: I think of that, too: her mind. Her brain, all those coils, and her thoughts shuttling through those coils like fast, frantic centipedes. Like a child, I picture opening her skull, unspooling her brain and sifting through it, trying to catch and pin down her thoughts. What are you thinking, Amy?
author: Gillian Flynn, Gone Girl
category: brain, centipedes, gone-girl, love, over-thinking, relationships, the-mind, the-unknown, thinking-process, thoughts

quote: The eyes of others my our prisons
author: their thoughts our cages.

quote: If you schlep a shit job everyday, keep and feed a little secret life--whether it's writing, art, running, music, your thoughts. It's yours.
author: Don Roff
